description.hltext_display: Porzellan aus Reichenbach im Museum für Thüringer Volkskunde
description.content:
Die Serie Colour der Porzellanmanufaktur Reichenbach setzt auf Farbe und alles passt zusammen. Foto: Andreas Schott
"Neuer Glanz in alten Formen" heißt die Ausstellung, mit der im Museum für Thüringer Volkskunde Erfurt das Porzellanjahr 2010 ausklingt.
250 Jahre Porzellan in Thüringen das Jubiläum bescherte den Verehrern des weißen Goldes eine Viehzahl sehenswerter und interessanter Ausstellung. Zum Ende des Jahres lädt nun das Museum für Thüringer Volkskunde ein, die Porzellanmanufaktur Reichenbach zu entdecken.
Über 100 Jahre reicht die Firmengeschichte der Reichenbacher Manufaktur zurück. Sie erlebte einen gestalterischen Höhepunkt mit Art-déco-Formen und neuer Sachlichkeit in den 20er Jahren. In der DDR wurde die Manufaktur enteignet und verstaatlicht. Ihre Erzeugnisse zählten zu den Exportschlagern der DDR, vor allem in den "sozialistischen Bruderländern". Doch wer noch ein paar Tassen und Kannen aus den 60er Jahren im Schrank hat, sollte einen Blick auf die Marke riskieren: Das von Ranken umringte, große verschlungene R unter einer kleinen Krone weist auf die Ostthüringer Herkunft der zerbrechlichen Teile hin. Mancher wird sich erinnern, wie allgegenwärtig einst das Service "Fatima" mit seiner Sanduhrform der Kanne, der unten angesetzten, geschwungenen Tülle und dem großen Henkel war. Im Museum ist ein besonders interessantes Exemplar des Mokkaservice zu bewundern, das mit baulichen Glanzpunkten der DDR-Hauptstadt wie Fernsehturm, Stalinallee, aber auch Rotes Rathaus und Brandenburger Tor verziert ist.
Heute ist die Manufaktur wieder in Privatbesitz und behauptet sich erfolgreich auf dem internationalen Parkett. Der Titel der Ausstellung in Erfurt "Neuer Glanz in alten Formen" ist auch Programm der aktuellen Porzellanproduktion. Die Schau belegt das mit Arbeiten der italienischen Designerin Paola Navone, die hippe Dekore für seit Jahrzehnten produzierte Formen entwickelte. Auch der ebenfalls für Reichenbach tätige Hamburger Porzellangestalter Gerd Sommerlade interpretiert Altes verblüffend neu. So lässt er den Scherben einst aufwändig bemalter Soldatenfiguren weiß und malt jeder einen farbigen Buchstaben auf den Rock, so dass die fünfköpfige Armee das Wort PEACE ergibt. Ebenfalls von Sommerlade stammt die Serie "Colour". Geschirrteile, die der Benutzer nach eigenen Gusto und Bedarf kombinieren kann, zehn Farben und 19 Formen stehen ihm dafür zu Verfügung. Egal, welche Farbe oder Form gewählt wird, alle harmonieren miteinander und ergänzen sich.
Auf 10 000 historische Formen können die Reichenbacher zurückgreifen, ein reicher Fundus für noch viel neuen Glanz.

description.hltext_display: El Barça se estrella contra la muralla del Athletic
description.content:
La noche de Reyes traerá un regalo más para los niños de FC Barcelona o Athletic Club de Bilbao, y es que San Mamés decidirá una eliminatoria totalmente abierta tras el empate sin goles que se ha visto este martes en el Camp Nou, en un encuentro con un solo dominador, como de costumbre el Barça, pero en el que los bilbaínos levantaron una efectiva e inquebrantable muralla defensiva.
Lo probaron hasta la saciedad los blaugrana, incansables en labúsqueda del gol que abriera el muro del Athletic. Lo hicieron con tranquilidad, primero, y a la heroica en los segundos finales, pero nunca sin encontrar el premio deseado. Sí lo hizo el Athletic, ya que encontró lo único que buscó en todo el partido, no encajar un gol.
En la primera parte el Barcelona jugó bien y a su antojo. Con un control absoluto, aplastante, las posesiones más largas del Athletic eran las que tenía Gorka antes de hacer los saques de portería. Sin embargo, este partido fue diferente a los últimos de los de Guardiola, en los que además de dominar en todo el campo obligaban a los porteros a recoger balones de dentro de su área.
El único punto negativo en los blaugrana fue que abusaron del toque sin llegar con peligro. Y es que si se hace buscando siempre los tres palos tiene sentido, pero si el delantero centro, Bojan hasta ser sustituido en el '62 por Villa, se abre y nadie busca el centro, los balones no encuentran rematador. La defensa bilbaína, con muchos hombres por delante de Gorka, dificultó el ataque local.
No es que faltaran ocasiones, como una de Bojan en el minuto 6 o dos buenos disparos de Iniesta que obligaron a Iraizoz a lucirse con sendas estiradas. Pedro, el más activo y el mejor del partido, no se cansó de correr para asistir a sus compañeros, pero faltaba la chispa habitual, esa sexta marcha que acostumbran a poner los de Guardiola.
Joaquín Caparrós, atento y nervioso siempre en su área técnica, veía como su planteamiento defensivo iba cobrando sentido con el paso de los minutos. El empate sin goles era bueno para los 'leones' de cara al partido de vuelta en San Mamés, y por ello no tocó ninguna pieza en su esquema, tan solo cambio de peones. Con ello, el Barcelona seguía siendo el amo y señor del partido y, con Messi en el campo, Guardiola intentó tener más pegada.
Por si acaso, entró el 'Guaje' Villa para añadir efectivos en punta en sustitución del renovado y desafortunado Bojan, que ni en su competición predilecta pudo reencontrarse con el gol. Tal era la telaraña defensiva del Athletic que el partido desembocó en un frontón. Los blaugrana incrementaron un poco el ritmo, buscando más el área, pero en pocas ocasiones el balón llegó a Iraizoz, pues la zaga repelía todos los balones.
Guardiola ordenó a sus delanteros que se movieran más e intercambiaran posiciones, para intentar despistar a los bilbaínos, pero ni así encontraron una vía fácil hacia el arco vasco. Orbaiz entró en el campo por el hoy mediapunta Iturraspe y, con este cambio, se evidenció más el planteamiento defensivo. Dos líneas muy juntas y pobladas, con solo Muniain un poco avanzado, eran una muralla demasiado harto complicada de superar. Messi, en una ocasión, consiguió penetrar pero Mateu Lahoz pitó una falta anterior al argentino, cortando la jugada y ganándose el abucheo del Camp Nou.
Los veinte jugadores de campo más Gorka levantaron un campamento en el campo del Athletic. El balón casi no cruzó la línea de medios, y el asedio blaugrana continuaba incansable siendo de las mejores ocasiones un tiro fuerte de Villa. Guardiola dio entrada a Adriano, buscando tener en ambas bandas laterales atacantes y con buen centro y abrir así más espacios.
Una única vez pasó el Athletic al campo contrario, pero fue prueba sin continuidad. Piqué sí subió, a lo Alexanko como acostumbra a hacer en casos de esta índole, y tuvo una buena ocasión que no pudo aprovechar. Hasta el pitido final, centros y más centros, poco utilizables, y a pensar ya en la vuelta esperando que el 2011 traiga pólvora para ambos equipos.
FICHA TÉCNICA.
--RESULTADO: FC BARCELONA, 0 - ATHLETIC CLUB, 0.
--EQUIPOS.
FC BARCELONA: Pinto; Alves, Piqué, Abidal, Maxwell; Mascherano (Adriano, min.78), Keita (Messi, min.53), Xavi; Pedro, Bojan (Villa, min.62) e Iniesta.
ATHLETIC: Iraizoz; Iraola, San José, Ustaritz, Koikili; Susaeta, Gurpegui, Javi Martínez, Gabilondo; Iturraspe (Orbaiz, min.66) e Igor Martínez (Muniain, min.54).
--ÁRBITRO: Mateu Lahoz (Col. Valenciano). Amonestó a Javi Martínez (min.32), Ustaritz (min.44), Gabilondo (min.52) y a Iraola (min.83) en el Athletic.
--ESTADIO: Camp Nou, 45.207 espectadores.

description.hltext_display: Ratings agency Moody's puts Portuguese government bonds on review
description.content:
MADRID - Ratings agency Moody's warned Tuesday it could downgrade Portugal's public debt because of uncertain economic growth amid the nation's austerity drive, the high cost of borrowing on global markets and worries about the banking sector.
Portugal's sovereign credit rating could be lowered a notch or two from A1, Moody's Investors Service said in a statement. The agency last week slashed Ireland's rating by five notches and also warned Spain and Greece of possible downgrades.
Portugal is considered one of the weakest links in the 16-nation eurozone and fears it could follow Greece and Ireland in needing a bailout have pushed its borrowing costs sharply higher. It has been struggling with high debt and low growth since before the global financial crisis, but the government insists it can resolve its problems without help.
"In Moody's opinion, Portugal's solvency is not in question," said Anthony Thomas, Moody's lead analyst for Portugal, "But the likely deterioration in debt affordability over the medium term and ongoing concerns about the economy's ability to withstand fiscal consolidation and private sector deleveraging mean its outlook may no longer be consistent with an A1 rating."
Many economists worry that eurozone nations' austerity efforts to cut deficits will also hurt growth and that banks' losses will weigh on public finances. After Greece and Ireland resorted to help from the EU and International Monetary Fund, Portugal and even much larger Spain — both still tapping the open market for credit — have caused borrowing rates to jump.
"The markets have remained open to the Portuguese government, but it is having to pay an elevated price, which if sustained will increase substantially its debt service costs over time," Thomas said.
Portugal has in the past borrowed huge amounts to finance welfare entitlements and private consumption. At the same time it has protected jobs through outdated labour laws that make it difficult to hire and fire workers while industry has broadly failed to modernize and is chronically uncompetitive.
The country's austerity package, due to be introduced Jan. 1, cuts the pay of public employees by an average 5 per cent, trims welfare benefits and hikes income tax and sales tax. The government is also in talks with unions about labour reforms.
Economy Minister Jose Vieira da Silva has said the government wants to reduce the financial and bureaucratic burden on companies reducing their workforce. That may include paying less compensation to fired workers.
Last year's state budget deficit of 9.6 per cent was below Greece's 15.4 per cent but was still the fourth-highest in the eurozone.
Portugal recorded growth of 1.8 per cent in the first nine months this year, and exports rose more than 15 per cent.

event_or_fact.property: In Moody's opinion, Portugal's solvency is not in question
The markets have remained open to the Portuguese government, but it is having to pay an elevated price, which if sustained will increase substantially its debt service costs over time

description.hltext_display: WANT to dance the night away in style this New Year’s Eve? We’ve a two-night break for two, worth £250, up for grabs.
description.content:
by Sarah Batley, Daily Post
The black tie £50-a-head gala four-course dinner is at Carreg Môn Hotel, Llanfairpwllgwyngyll, Anglesey, overseen by head chef Bob Marshall. It will be followed by local band The Usual Suspects, with hits from big band classics to chart toppers.
Hotel owner Ruth Hogan said: “This New Year’s Eve we are pulling out all the stops to make sure the gala dinner will be one to remember.”
Guests staying over get a special rate of £50 for a double room, including breakfast. Tickets from 01248 714224 or carregmonhotel.co.uk.

description.hltext_display: 涉拉薩動亂3藏僧 入獄後下落不明 (央廣)
description.content:
總部設在美國的國際西藏運動(International Campaign for Tibet, ICT)22日發布新聞稿指出，3名西藏佛教高僧，在2008年拉薩動亂之後被判刑下獄，至今下落不明，西藏民眾非常擔心他們的安危。
這3名高僧都是拉薩哲蚌寺的教授，2008年3月的大規模和平示威時，他們就站在民眾的最前線。不過，和平示威後來演變成暴力騷亂。
這3名高僧分別是55歲的蔣波旺卻(Jampel Wangchuk)，哲蚌寺洛色林學院(Loseling college)教授，據信被判處無期徒刑。43歲的康切尼瑪(Konchok Nyima)，哲蚌寺果芒學院(Gomang college)教授，被判處20年徒刑；以及38歲的納汪丘尼(Ngawang Choenyi)，浪卡學院教授，被判處15年徒刑。
國際西藏運動指出，外界都不認為這3名高僧參加了示威，也不清楚他們究竟被以什麼罪名判刑。
根據瞭解，中國經常使用一些籠統的罪名，來對付政治和宗教上的異議份子。
中國政府指出，拉薩暴動最少有22人死亡；但是西藏人權組織指出，有將近140名西藏人遇害。

description.hltext_display: Drei Verletzte bei Feuer in Großenwiehe
description.content: Groenwiehe - Bei einem Feuer in Groenwiehe (Kreis Schleswig-Flensburg) sind am Mittwochmorgen drei Menschen verletzt worden. Sie versuchten, ein brennendes Auto aus einer Halle zu bergen. Dabei erlitten sie eine Rauchvergiftung. Die Freiwillige Feuerwehr lschte die Flammen. In der Halle waren landwirtschaftliche Maschinen und Fahrzeuge untergestellt. Nach Angaben der Polizei Flensburg entstanden an dem Gebude nur geringe Schden. Zur Brandursache und zur Schadenshhe gab es zunchst keine Erkenntnisse. Die Kripo nahm die Ermittlungen auf.

description.hltext_display: 任志强牛刀再战房价赌局 业内判断任志强不接招
description.author: sohu.com
description.content:
针对年初关于房价的一则赌局，牛刀和任志强昨日再起舌战。
今年1月，任志强预测“今年房价同比涨幅至少达5%，凡是预测房价会跌的都是瞎说”。随后，牛刀在博客中叫板任志强：“如果2010年70个大中城市的房价没有5%的涨幅，请你从此闭嘴。”
而时值年底，关于房价的涨幅即将揭开谜底，在日前出席一场研讨会时，任志强表示：“11月全国房价同比涨幅仍达到7.7%，和我当初预测至少达到5%差不多。即使12月再降一些，涨幅也会达到6%。”但对于自己是否已在和牛刀的赌局中获胜，任志强不愿正面回答。而牛刀昨日在博客中做出回应，指任志强判断“错漏百出”，劝其收回赌约，并称：“如果和我赌下去，一定会身败名裂。”
房价之赌，任志强赢了？
在年初的预测中，任志强曾表示今年房价同比涨幅至少达5%，凡是预测房价会跌的都是瞎说。对于任志强的观点，2月21日，地产评论员牛刀以《悲哀！开发商对2010房价全体误判》为题发表博客：“任志强是条汉子，就要为你所讲的话负责。如果2010年70个大中城市的房价没有5%的涨幅，请你从此闭嘴。”如果事实果真如任志强等房地产商预测的那样，他也将“同样认输，从此不谈房价”。
这场“任牛之赌”引起社会各界广泛关注，牛刀、任志强也各自拥有庞大的“粉丝团”。时至今日，2010年即将过去，究竟谁输谁赢呢？在日前举办的2010年中国房地产市场形势分析会上，任志强坦言，今年以来，从国家统计局发布的全国房地产运行数据来看，70个大中城市房价同比涨幅呈下降走势，从年初的10%以上回落至11月的7.7%。“不过，11月全国房价同比涨幅仍达到7.7%，和我当初预测至少达到5%差不多。即使12月再降一些，涨幅也会达到6%。”对于自己是否已在和牛刀的赌局中获胜，任志强不愿意正面回答。
不过，却有媒体把文章标题为《任志强回应与牛刀赌局：房价涨幅或达6% 我赢了》，将这场赌局再度摆上了台面。
牛刀劝任志强收回赌约
对此，昨日牛刀发表博文《任志强先生，请你撤销房价赌局！》：“年初之时，很多媒体报道这件事，也问过任志强，任志强从没有表示接赌局。既然当初不敢接招，现在到了年终却突然拿出来说事，是何用意？”牛刀再度强调，国家统计局数据并未正式发布，任志强所述之言纯属空穴来风，难成定局，并劝其收回赌约。
牛刀博文还称：“任志强先生毕竟只是一个商人，不可能有时间研究宏观经济学，所以，许多判断错漏百出。平时做做演讲可以，真拿理论出来，我不相信任志强能够讲得清楚什么。同样，尽管到了年终，国家统计局就要发布数据，但是，毕竟没有正式发布，你却认为你赢了。我告诉你，你的判断是错误的。”牛刀在劝任志强“现在就收回赌约”的同时，还又再下战书：“如果和我赌下去，一定会身败名裂。”
不过，对于这场“任牛之赌”，业内人士判断任志强不会接招，因为接招就算上了牛刀的“圈套”。
-新闻背景
房价赌局并无新意
事实上，房价赌局毫无新意。牛刀之所以出名，是因为2007年曾与经济学家徐滇庆就深圳房价设下赌局并取胜。2008年7月11日，深圳官方公布新盘均价为13421元/平方米，低于2007年同一天的15745元/平方米。牛刀胜出，徐滇庆告败，并兑现诺言公开登报道歉。然而，这并没有妨碍2009年的深圳房价“跑步”进入2万元时代。
搜房网消息披露称，至于牛刀，曾说自己是在2007年7月份买的房。那时正是他和徐对赌的焦点时期。他一边说房价要跌，一边买房，那么无论房价是跌是涨他都赚了：如果跌了，那么赚了名声；如果不跌，他也代表了民意，而且也赚了房子利差。在这场赌局中，说到底老百姓并没有得益。(赵燕华、霍映丹)

description.hltext_display: DCM II under probe for alleged cronyism
description.author: Athi Shankar
description.content:
GEORGE TOWN: DAP's top leadership will investigate allegations of nepotism and cronism lodged by three party members against Deputy Chief Minister II P Ramasamy.
National chairman Karpal Singh said the allegations raised by the trio in a letter dated Nov 25 were serious enough to warrant a thorough probe by the party leadership.
“We cannot ignore the allegations. We must investigate them and clear the air once and for all.
“Otherwise, it will tarnish the party's image and credibility,” he told FMT.
Three party members – S Deventhiran from Bukit Tambun Manis branch, M Mahendran (Taman Mangga) and Manogaran (Kampung Manis) – wrote the two-page letter containing the allegations.
The letter was sent to Chief Minister and DAP secretary-general Lim Guan Eng, and carbon-copied to Karpal, state DAP chairman Chow Kon Yeow, Bukit Mertajam MP Chong Eng and Datuk Keramat assemblyman Jagdeep Singh Deo.
In the letter, the trio alleged that Ramasamy's cronies have been awarded many state contracts.
They hinted that the DCM II had influenced the decision-making process to award the contracts.
The contracts include Tamil school development and computer supply, Penang Water Supply Corporation and Penang Hindu Endowments Board tenders.
Surrounded by cronies
The trio have listed the names of at least 16 people as Ramasamy's cronies, including his personal aides Jayabalan and M Satees.
The trio have also alleged that since being appointed as the DCM II, Ramasamy has deliberately sidelined and isolated existing long-serving Indian members of the party.
Instead, they claimed that Ramasamy had fenced himself with a group of cronies, largely from Barisan Nasional and strangers.
The allegations are not something new. They have been around for the past two years.
Many long-serving Indian members even claimed that Ramasamy and several other elected representatives were undermining their efforts to revitalise the abandoned Indian affairs bureau in the party.
“Some were unknown before the election and some worked against DAP during the polls. But they are now influential figures within Ramasamy's inner circle.
“Many are MIC members,” claimed certain party members on the alleged cronies.
In the letter, Deventhiran, Mahendran and Manogaran alleged that Ramasamy had failed to carry any worthy projects to help the marginalised Indian community in the state, especially in his own Batu Kawan parliamentary and Prai state constituencies.
The trio had called upon Lim to immediately probe into their complaints.
They vowed to furnish the inquiry with correct information and proper evidence.
Nothing to hide
In his response, Ramasamy hit back at the complainants, claiming that they were not even genuine party members.
Following his office's check on the complainants, he claimed that the trio had given false identities and details in the letter.
However, he said he was prepared to face any investigation into the allegations since he has nothing to hide.
“All these contracts were awarded through open tenders.
“And I don't sit in the state tender board,” he said.
He said the timing of the letter clearly showed that it was maliciously meant to undermine his campaign to get elected into the state committee.
The state DAP held its election on Dec 12, in which Ramasamy won and was subsequently appointed as new state DAP deputy chairman.
Karpal has hinted that the internal investigation would include calling up witnesses including the complainants, the accused and alleged cronies.
“The party leadership cannot neglect complaints by its own members,” Karpal said, adding that he would soon talk to Lim on the issue.

event_or_fact.property: he was prepared to face any investigation into the allegations since he has nothing to hide

the internal investigation would include calling up witnesses including the complainants, the accused and alleged cronies.
he would soon talk to Lim on the issue.
the trio had given false identities and details in the letter.

description.hltext_display: Viele Nächte mit Erika verbracht
description.content:
Ihr munteres Geklapper zeigte an: Hier schreibt einer - Schreibmaschine der DDR-Marke "Erika".
Der Rudolstädter Schriftsteller Matthias Biskupeks hat 52 Nachrufe auf die DDR verfasst. Sie sind in dem Kalender "Trabi, Broiler, Pioniere" enthalten, der schon die Gewinner beim TLZ-Parcours beglückte. Der Kalender ist in jeder Buchhandlung erhältlich.
Rudolstadt. Ganz gewiss ist Matthias Biskupek unsterblich verliebt gewesen, vielleicht sogar in Erika. Zumindest widmet er der treuen Gefährtin eines der liebevollsten seiner 52 Kalenderblätter: "Die Schreibmaschine vom Typ Erika war ein robustes, wenig störanfälliges Gerät", heißt es in dem kurzen Nachruf. Ihr munteres Geklapper habe jederzeit angezeigt: Hier schreibt einer! Und sie diente gelegentlich auch als Alibi. "Ich habe die Nacht mit Erika verbracht" oder "Ich muss noch zu meiner Erika", begründeten DDR-Schriftsteller ihr nächtliches Fernbleiben.
Wer noch einmal mit dem Rudolstädter Autor einige Erinnerungen des untergegangenen Landes abklappern möchte, dem sei dessen Kalender "Trabi, Broiler, Pioniere 2011" empfohlen, der im angemessenen Kleinformat (A5) im Harenberg-Verlag, Mannheim, erschienen und für 9.99 Euro zu haben ist.
Fotos wurden vom Verlag vorgegeben
Die Kalenderfotos, erklärt Biskupek, seien ihm von den Verlagsleuten - also Wessis - vorgegeben worden, die im wesentlichen nach bekannten DDR-Produkten Ausschau gehalten hatten. Ein bloßes Potpourri aus Trabi, Plaste, Spee und Sandmännchen hätte ihm nicht behagt, weshalb er darauf bestand, gesellschaftliche Phänomene wie Schlangestehen oder die Jugendweihe mit aufzunehmen. Sowieso hängt für einen im Osten sozialisierten Schriftsteller an fast jedem Gegenstand eine biografische Geschichte. Die Schwierigkeit bestand darin, sie im vorgegeben Rahmen - maximal acht Kalenderzeilen - zu erzählen. Dabei half ihm, dass er schon für das Kompendium "Was heißt eigentlich ,DDR'?" (Eulenspiegel-Verlag) und das "Kleine DDR-Lexikon - Von Haushaltstag bis Reisekader" (Piper) in Vorleistung gegangen war.
Das neue Biskupek-Jahr beginnt denn auch mit Erfolgsgeschichten, die sich nach der Wende ereignet haben: Die ostdeutsche Sektfirma Rotkäppchen schluckt die westdeutsche Marke Mumm, die Rockgruppe Silly hat ihre an Krebs gestorbene Sängerin Tamara Danz überlebt und mischt fröhlich die Charts auf, und auch das putzige Ampelmännchen setzt sich deutschlandweit durch. DDR-Nostalgie? - Fehlanzeige! Der Ton macht die Kalendermusik, und der ist meist milde ironisch, manchmal auch bissig, wie man es von einem Satiriker erwartet.
Zurecht dürfe man, meint Biskupek, auf "Made in GDR" stolz sein, wenn es sich etwa um Marken wie Florena, Erwin Strittmatter, Henry Hübchen oder Bummi handelt. Auch die DDR-Briefmarken waren nicht die schlechtesten. Allerdings ließ zumeist das Marketing - siehe Tempobohnen, Hallorenkugeln oder Bautz'ner Kosakensenf - einige Konsumentenwünsche offen. Der sozialistische Modetanz "Lipsi", konstatiert der Kalender-Kurzprosaschreiber, konnte sich als Gegenstück zum dekadenten Rock'n'Roll nicht durchsetzen.
Von Subbotnik bis Bückware
Biskupek hat dem DDR-Volk aufs Maul geschaut, was man an gängigen Bezeichnungen wie "Wohnklo mit Kochnische" (für die Einraumneubauwohnung) erkennt. Auch Begriffe wie Subbotnik und Bückware werden erläutert. Geliebt wurde in der Arbeiter- und Bauern-Diktatur leidenschaftlich - siehe die "Legende von Paul und Paula" -, und man liebte die alten Filme à la "Feuerzangenbowle" oder "Große Freiheit Nr. 7", die Willi Schwabe aus seiner Rumpelkammer kramte, nicht weniger als im Westen.
Noch im Rückblick beschämend: Es wurde gewählt, doch nur pro forma, denn das Wunschergebnis der "führenden Partei" stand vorab fest, so musste das Wahlverhalten der Bürger diesem - oft unter Druck - angepasst werden. Ein Foto aus dem Jahr 1983 zeigt fünf vor einer Konsum-Kaufhalle geparkte Kinderwagen - daran lässt sich der "Ehekredit" verdeutlichen. Und man war auch im Osten weihnachtlich gestimmt - mit dem Dresdener Christstollen, der so gut mundet, dass er alle Systeme überdauert.

description.hltext_display: El C.A. Almaraz Extremadura estuvo en Venta de Baños y en Villanueva de la Serena
description.content:
Extremadura al Dia
Brahim Rabhi
El Almaraz-Extremadura tuvo presencia competitiva un fin de semana más en puntos dispares de la geografía nacional y así Pablo Villalobos y Cristina Jordán disputaron el Cross Internacional de Venta de Baños mientras la base del club tomaba parte en la cuarta jorndada de la Liga Regional de Cross en Villanueva de la Serena.
En tierras palentinas tuvo lugar el Cross Internacional de Venta de Baños con un intenso frio como gran protagonista que dificulto enormemente la tarea de los atletas. Cristina Jordán, que estrenaba su flamante subcampeonato de Europa de Campo a Través Sub-23 conseguía una cómoda victoria en su categoría siendo la séptima clasificada absoluta en meta, quinta entre las españolas. En cuanto a Pablo, volvió a demostrar que aunque el cross no está entre sus principales objetivos de la temporada invernal, está en un gran estado de forma y finalizó en un sensacional décimo tercer puesto, séptimo entre los españoles.
En cuanto a los más jóvenes del club, se desplazaron a Villanueva para disputar la cuarta jornada de la liga regional de clubes. Los resultados más destacados fueron los conseguidos por Alberto García y Nabil Gassa que fueron primero y tercero en infantil masculino, el tercer puesto de Aziza el Mantouk en cadete femenino, el segundo puesto de Hassam Amar en promesa masculino y las victorias de Brahim Rabhi y Mohamed Bouda en juvenil y junior.

description.hltext_display: 中國指責教廷發言批評 「冒失且無理」 (央廣)
description.content:
中國國家宗教事務局22日駁斥教廷日前批評中國天主教第八次代表會議的相關內容。
中國國家宗教事務局一名發言人說，教廷新聞室17日公開發表聲明，指責先前中國天主教召開的第八次代表會議，是攻擊中國宗教信仰的自由政策。這名發言人說，教廷的這項行為不僅「非常冒失，而且十分無理」。
根據報導，教廷新聞室在17日發表的聲明裡，指控中國天主教召開代表會議，事前未經教廷認可，是「令人無法接受的敵對行為」，並將造成雙方「互信的莫大損失」。

description.hltext_display: Squamosa into Millions first-up
description.content:
Gai Waterhousehas decided against starting Squamosa at Randwick on Sunday and plans to run the colt first-up in the Magic Millions Guineas next month.
Squamosa was nominated to make his return in a Benchmark 85 this weekend but Waterhouse wasn't happy with the Golden Rose runner-up on Wednesday and has decided against running him.
"I'm going to take him straight to the Magic Millions," Waterhouse said.
"I wasn't 100 per cent happy with him this morning so I would sooner give him a little time. There's a million-dollar race waiting for us on the 15th (of January), I would sooner set him for that."
Squamosa hasn't raced since his game second to Toorak Toff in the Group One Golden Rose (1400m) on August 28.
The colt had won his only three starts prior to the Golden Rose and is the current Magic Millions Guineas favourite with TAB Sportsbet at $2.80.
Waterhouse said the colt didn't have any problems but she wasn't happy enough with him to take him to the races on Sunday.
"I just wasn't 100 per cent happy with him this morning. I thought to myself there's too much money involved, I'll give him a couple of days just going to the beach and shooting the breeze and reassess him.
"If he goes to the Magic Millions he'll run first-up there."

description.hltext_display: Cum ne decorăm brazii de Crăciun anul acesta VEZI TENDINŢELE DIN 2010
description.content: Moda 2010 de Crăciun: Brazii tcu decoraţiuni turcoaz Imaginea 1/1 Anul acesta, se poartă cât mai multe luminiţe şi ornamente strălucitoare. Căutaţi decoraţiuni în tonuri bogate de bronz, de rubin şi de turcoaz, precum şi tradiţionalele ornamente argintii şi aurii. Combinaţi aceste străluciri cu şiraguri de perle pentru un impact mai mare.În ceea ce priveşte combinaţia culorilor, încercaţi altceva în afară de tradiţionalul roşu şi verde. Anul acesta se poartă combinaţiile de albastru şi maro, roz şi maro, argintiu şi turcoaz şi imprimeurile animale cu negru. Folosiţi-le ca accente în ghirlande, coroniţe şi ornamentele pentru brad.Luminiţele de anul acesta trebuie să fie LED-uri, pentru economisirea energiei şi pentru protecţia mediului, prin urmare.

description.hltext_display: Moody's Portugal review dampens euro
description.content:
LONDON (Reuters) - The euro pared gains on Tuesday after Moody's put Portugal on review for a possible downgrade, while world stocks rose, driven by bargain-hunting investors betting on stronger global growth next year.
Cold weather in Europe and the United States kept oil prices firm for the third straight session, while copper hit an all-time high, buoyed by supply disruption from Chile.
U.S. Treasury yields were steady and U.S. stock index futures added about 0.3 percent, indicating a firmer open on Wall Street.
Moody's Investors Service warned it may cut debt-ridden Portugal's A1 rating by one or two notches after a review, citing weak growth prospects and high borrowing costs.
That followed its move last week to cut Ireland's credit rating by five notches to Baa1, the third last investment grade rank, and put Spain's rating on review for a possible cut.
The euro rose 0.3 percent to $1.3159 after trading as high as $1.3200 earlier in the session, boosted by a short-covering rally in Asian trade. It fell to a fresh all-time low against the Swiss franc, at 1.2615 francs.
The dollar fell 0.2 percent against a basket of major currencies.
Concerns that the euro zone sovereign debt crisis will spread from Greece and Ireland to Portugal and even possibly Spain and Italy have weighed across global markets.
"The Moody's announcement on Portugal has knocked some of today's optimism out of the euro but these credit announcements are not completely out of the blue any more so the negative reaction is always going to be a little bit more dampened than six months ago," said Jane Foley, senior currency analyst at Rabobank.
"I don't think this announcement on its own will be capable of knocking the euro out of its range."
Portuguese bond yields rose, with the premium investors demand to hold 10-year Portuguese government bonds over German Bunds widening by 10 basis points to 371 bps, while Spanish 10-year spreads moved out by 3 bps to 259 bps over Bunds.
Five-year Portuguese credit default swaps, an insurance-like product against debt default, rose 10 bps to 490 bps.
"People are expecting further actions from the ratings agencies anyway," said Charles Diebel, head of market strategy at Lloyd's TSB in London.
TAKING STOCK
Portuguese stocks rose 0.6 percent, while Europe's FTSEurofirst 300 index gained 0.7 percent, after hitting a 27-month high earlier, and Wall Street was poised for opening gains.
"The thing that may have changed in the last few weeks is the fact that the bond market has sold off," said Michael O'Sullivan, head of global asset allocation at Credit Suisse.
"That has been probably causing a lot of people to confront the fact that in a recovery part of the business cycle government bonds tend to be worse performing than equities."
Shares of basic resources companies were among the top gainers in Europe on firmer metal prices.
In Asia, Japan's Nikkei average gained 1.5 percent to hit a seven-month closing high.
Global stocks measured by the MSCI All-Country World Index advanced 0.5 percent. The benchmark carries a one-year forward price-to-earnings of 12.5 times, Thomson Reuters Datastream showed.
In terms of sector valuations, energy, financials, telecoms and the healthcare sector carry one-year forward P/Es with a 4 to 13 percent discount to the world index, while the forward P/Es for materials and utilities are in line.
Oil rose for the third straight session, up 0.7 percent and topping $89 a barrel on the back of cold weather in Europe and the United States. Copper prices rose 1.2 percent, their third day of gains, after a halt in shipments by the world's No. 3 copper mine, Chile's Collahusai.
Yields on benchmark 10-year U.S. Treasuries fell 2 bps to 3.3242 percent. They hit a seven-month high of 3.5675 percent last week.
(Additional reporting by Neal Armstrong, Emily Flitter, William James and Anirban Nag in London; Editing by Susan Fenton)

description.hltext_display: 361度國際於二零一一年度秋季大型訂貨會訂單增長達23% (美通社)
description.content:
新聘高級管理人員 壯大管理層
香港2010年12月22日電 /美通社亞洲/ -- 中國領先運動品牌企業之一，361度國際有限公司(「361度國際」或「公司」，及其附屬公司，總稱「集團」；香港聯交所股票編號：1361)今天欣然宣布，本公司於福建晉江五?工業園展覽中心舉行之二零一一年度秋季361度產品經銷商訂貨會昨天圓滿結束。該訂貨會於十二月十五日展開，共吸引約4,000個零售商及其員工、經銷商及貿易專員出席。
訂單總金額 +23% (與二零一零年度秋季訂貨會比較)
數量
-- 服裝 +10%
-- 鞋類 +8%
平均售價
-- 服裝 +13%
-- 鞋類 +12%
由本公司於廣州新設立的設計及研發中心的產品，於是次訂貨會上首次展示，啟發許多新意念。全新的「三系列」跑鞋設計新穎，結合內部研發的NFO 科技，極受零售商歡迎。同場展出還包括性能獲提升的高端運動鞋。這是專為最近結束的第十六屆廣州亞運會的手球、壘球及曲棍球項目的中國國家隊設計。
二零一一年秋季系列預期將於六月起分批運送到門市銷售。
由是次秋季訂貨會起，出廠價的折扣將調低200個基點，與本公司已確立的分銷模式一致。
本公司亦欣然宣布，本公司最近新聘兩名高級管理層。王宏征先生加入本公司擔任營運事業中心副總裁，而朱晨曄女士擔任品牌管理中心副總裁。在此之前，王先生為美特斯邦威的高級管理人員，而朱女士於愛迪達（Adidas）中國擔任類似職位逾十年。集團總裁丁伍號先生宣布該兩項新委任時表示：「我們相信，新增兩個高級職位，顯示本公司壯大管理層的決心。我們相信，本公司將憑藉其雄厚根基，在業內繼續保持增長。」
本公司同時欣然宣布，於十一月底，本公司的零售網絡共有逾7,100間零售店，地理位置適中，其中70%設於第三線或更小型城市。
關於361度國際有限公司
361度國際有限公司為中國領先的體育品牌企業之一，擁有品牌行銷、研發、設計、製造、經銷及零售能力，產品主要包括運動及休閒鞋類、服裝、配件和器材系列。集團主要採用自營加外包生產和獨家特許分銷商模式，已於中國建立龐大的供應鏈管理體系以及分銷和零售網絡。

description.hltext_display: Cientistas criam rato que gorjeia
description.content:
Tóquio. Cientistas japoneses anunciaram, ontem, a criação de um rato que gorjeia como um pássaro, uma "evolução" produzida pela engenharia genética e com a qual esperam lançar novas luzes sobre as origens da linguagem humana.
Uma equipe de pesquisadores da Universidade de Osaka, no oeste do Japão, criou o animal, como parte do "Projeto Rato Evoluído", no qual os cientistas usam cobaias geneticamente modificadas propensas a mutações. "As mutações são a força motriz da evolução. Cruzamos ratos geneticamente modificados por gerações para ver o que acontecia", afirmou o coordenador do estudo, Arikuni Uchimura. De acordo com ele, o "rato cantador" nasceu por acaso, mas esse traço será transmitido a futuras gerações.
O laboratório, dirigido pelo professor Takeshi Yagi, da Escola de Estudos Superiores de Biociências de Fronteira da Universidade de Osaka, conta atualmente com mais de 100 "ratos cantores" para investigações.
Estudo
A equipe espera que estes animais deem pistas sobre a evolução da linguagem humana. Os cientistas descobriram que as aves utilizam diferentes elementos sonoros, que emitem juntos, em partes, como as palavras da linguagem humana, e depois "encadeiam" esses pedaços em "canções" sujeitas a certas regras linguísticas.
"Os ratos são mais fáceis de se estudar do que as aves, uma vez que são mamíferos e estão muito mais perto dos seres humanos em termos de estrutura cerebral e outros aspectos biológicos", explicou Uchimura. "Estamos vendo como um rato que emite novos sons afeta os do mesmo grupo, se tem conotações sociais", disse.

description.hltext_display: Miguel Periañez, del C.A. Perceiana Extremadura, establece la mejor marca extremeña de la temporada en la prueba de 10 km. marcha
description.content:
Extremadura al Día
El atleta del Club Atletismo Perceiana-Extremadura (CAPEX), Miguel Periañez, establecía en la mañana del pasado domingo, una nueva mejor marca extremeña de la temporada en la prueba de 10 km marcha en ruta, en el transcurso de la celebración del VI Criterium Nacional de Invierno de Marcha Atlética y el XIII Trofeo de Marcha Atlética Asoc. Dptva. Cerro Buenavista, disputado en Getafe. Miguel que finalizaba en 5ª posición en la categoría de veteranos, conseguía completar los 10.000 metros de la misma en un tiempo de 49 minutos y 59 segundos.
Este crono, le permite además, convertirse en el recordman perceiano de la distancia, pulverizando la anterior plusmarca que poseía el atleta promesa Antonio Hernández Morales, con un tiempo de 59:51 logrado en la localidad murciana de San Pedro del Pinatar en marzo del 2009.

description.hltext_display: Studiu: Jumătate dintre români au cele mai curate maşini, comparativ cu ţările vecine
description.content:
Studiu: Aproape jumătate dintre şoferii din România au cele mai curate maşini, comparativ cu ţările vecine / FOTO: Grup RC Imaginea 1/1 Potrivit studiului, şoferii români au cele mai curate maşini: 44% îşi spală maşina o dată pe săptămână şi 28% dintre ei trec o dată la două săptămâni pe la spălătorie, relatează HotNews.
De asemenea, studiul a mai arătat că 38% dintre români şi 35% dintre bulgari consideră că se descurcă bine când vine vorba de îngrijirea şi întreţinerea maşinii, în timp ce şoferii maghiari (39%) au considerat că se descurcă rezonabil.
În ceea ce priveşte echiparea maşinii pentru sezonul rece, şoferii bulgari (82%) şi unguri (76%) au fost mai activi în acest sens decât cei români (60%), 25% dintre şoferii români fiind încă în aşteptarea primei zăpezi pentru a schimba cauciucurile.
Studiul Chevrolet a fost întocmit pe un eşantion de 1.500 conducători auto din România, Bulgaria şi Ungaria, în timp ce cercetarea completă a inclus 4.700 de şoferi din 11 ţări europene, printre care Ungaria, România, Bulgaria, Republica Cehă, Slovacia, Estonia, Letonia şi Lituania. �

description.hltext_display: 今年房价涨多少？任志强“口水战”再升级
description.author: sohu.com
description.content:
任志强和牛刀年初关于房价涨跌的“口水战”昨日再度升级。华远集团总裁任志强日前在某房地产论坛上公开表示，年初关于“今年房价同比涨幅至少达5%”的预测已经实现。在和地产评论员牛刀的赌局中，他显然赢了。但昨天，牛刀在博客中否定了这一说法。
今年1月22日，任志强在公开场合表示，“今年房价同比涨幅至少达5%，凡是预测房价会跌的都是瞎说。”针对任志强的观点，2月21日，著名地产评论员牛刀发表题为《悲哀！开发商对2010房价全体误判》的博客，称在目前的经济增长状态和城乡居民收入水平下，今年我国70个大中城市的房价不可能增长5%。牛刀放言，如果事实果真如任志强等房地产商预测得那样，他也将“同样认输，从此不谈房价”。两人间的你来我往，引发了背后“粉丝团”的强烈对峙。
12月19日，在某房地产论坛上，任志强再提此次争论，称自己已在赌局中赢了。
任志强的率先表态，也再度引发牛刀的愤怒。昨天凌晨，牛刀通过博客否定了老任的言论，并在标题中直接申明请任志强先生撤销房价赌局。

description.hltext_display: Abigail’s Disney dream wrecked by late setbacks
description.content:
A LITTLE girl’s dream trip to Disneyland Paris was shattered after she fell ill and got taken twice to hospital instead.
Five-year-old Abigail Williams, of Llandudno, had been due to take a four-day holiday to the French capital but was treated for a very high temperature and later an eye injury from a fall at home.
Dad Kevin Williams was disappointed but reflected that they would have been caught up in travel chaos at St Pancras Station if they had been returning on Eurostar as planned on Monday.
Abigail has the debilitating condition variant Batten’s disease and was due to visit the theme park with the When You Wish Upon A Star charity which grants the wishes of children suffering from a life threatening illness.
Kevin and Abigail’s mum Christine Whitley were about to set off from home in Hospital Road with Abigail and her sister Lauren on Thursday at 1pm for a London hotel en route to Paris.
But Abigail developed an alarmingly high temperature of 40.ºC which, at its peak went up to 40.8ºC. They phoned her GP then an ambulance which took her to Ysbyby Glan Clwyd in Bodelwyddan.
She improved over 48 hours after being given antibiotics in an intravenous drip. Kevin said: "She picked up and started playing with her sister. But she had a little seizure, fell and suffered a nasty gash on her right eye.”
Her dad took the Ysgol y Gogarth pupil back to Ysbyty Glan Clwyd to have several butterfly stitches.
Kevin said: "Even though it was bad that she was in hospital, we would have come back through St Pancras so we avoided all that.
"She was looking forward to seeing Mickey Mouse so much. But I’ve spoken to When You Wish Upon a Star. They say it’s not the first time there has been a cancellation when you consider the children that they help.
"They say I can give them a ring in the New Year to re-arrange the trip. So fair play to them.”

event_or_fact.property: She picked up and started playing with her sister.
Even though it was bad that she was in hospital, we would have come back through St Pancras so we avoided all that.

description.hltext_display: Coreea de Sud pune paie pe foc în conflictul cu Nordul
description.content: face exerciţii militare la graniţa cu Nordul / FOTO: www.latimes.com Imaginea 1/1 a început miercuri un exerciţiu militar în Marea Japoniei, la aproximativ 100 kilometri sud de graniţa disputată cu , care susţine că apele din jurul Yeonpyeong îi aparţin. Potrivit Ministerului sud-coreean al Apărării, exerciţiul va dura trei zile. Cel puţin şase nave şi elicoptere antisubmarin participă la exerciţiile din Marea Japoniei, prin care sud-coreeni vor să arate că armata lor este pregătită "pentru orice atac" al Nordului.Tensiunile dintre Seul şi Phenian riscă astfel să se intensifice după ce, pe 23 noiembrie au escaladat, atunci când a lansat un atac asupra insulei sud-coreene Yeonpyeong, care s-a soldat cu patru morţi.

description.hltext_display: 韓股指不懼“北韓威脅”繼續攀升 (朝鮮日報)
description.content:
21日，韓國軍隊實施延坪島射擊演習的第二天，韓國KOSPI指數便企穩回升，刷新了今年以來最高點。當天，KOSPI指數以2037.09點收盤，較前一個交易日上漲16.81點（0.83%）。
儘管外資和機構紛紛拋售，但散戶買超接近4000億韓元，帶動了股市上揚。當天，KOSPI指數自2007年11月7日之後，時隔3年零1個月攀升至最高點，接近於2007年10月31日曾創下的歷史最高紀錄（2064.85點）。
尤其是，一直都是大盤上漲“主力軍”的汽車類股表現疲軟，而鋼鐵、煉油等一直表現疲弱的個股卻大幅飆升，讓人期待股指突破今年以來最高點。當天，受鋼鐵價格上漲，預期未來收益提升的利好影響，POSCO、現代制鐵、現代制鋼HYSCO等鋼鐵股集體上漲5%以上。此外，煉油類股也受收益率樂觀預期帶動，呈現出強勁的上升勢頭。總市值最大的三星電子股則連續三天上揚，刷新了歷史新高（93.6萬韓元）。另外，當天KOSDAQ指數也上漲8.72點（1.75%），時隔五天反彈。

description.hltext_display: Тюменцам предлагают продукты к новогоднему столу
description.content:
Тюмень. Предновогодняя ярмарка откроется в Выставочном зале 25 декабря. В ней примут участие 65 хозяйствующих субъектов.
Для праздничного стола тюменцы смогут приобрести мясо и мясопродукты, рыбу и рыбопродукты, молочную продукцию, яйца, колбасные изделия, мед, дикоросы и многое другое. Также горожан ждут пушистые ели и новогодние игрушки, сообщает пресс-служба администрации Тюмени.

description.hltext_display: Bank of Japan holds rate steady, continues easing measures
description.content:
Bank of Japan headquarters (green roof and next white building) stands in central Tokyo. Japan's central bank on Tuesday kept its key rate unchanged between zero and 0.1 percent in a widely expected move as it examines the impact of earlier measures to boost a faltering economy.
Japan's central bank on Tuesday kept its key rate unchanged as it said it would continue measures to boost the faltering economy amid fears of a looming slowdown.
The board made a unanimous decision to keep the key rate at between zero and 0.1 percent after a two-day meeting, warning that a fragile recovery from deep recession was "pausing" despite showing "signs of a moderate recovery".
"The bank will continue to carefully examine the outlook for economic activity and prices, and take policy action in an appropriate manner," the BoJ said in a statement released together with the rate announcement.
The decision followed the BoJ's move in October to adopt a near zero rate policy and a five trillion yen (60 billion dollar) asset purchase scheme to lower borrowing costs and help tackle deflation.
The move added to a previous 30 trillion yen scheme to boost liquidity and spur growth.
The central bank has only just begun its programme of asset purchases announced in October, which includes government and corporate bonds and riskier exchange traded funds (ETFs) and real estate investment trusts (REITS).
However, several economists expect the central bank to be forced to ease policy further -- such as by expanding its new asset-buying facility -- early next year, as the economy faces the threat of a slowdown.
Many argue that the planned five trillion yen fund to buy assets is too small in that it represents a tiny amount of the total money supply.
Recent rises in Japanese bond yields may also compel the BoJ to do more to keep borrowing costs low, analysts say.
Bank of Japan Governor Masaaki Shirakawa told reporters Tuesday that recent rises in Japanese yields reflect similar moves in US Treasury bills on the back of a brighter outlook for the US economy.
The two-year cash JGB yield stood at 0.205 percent earlier Tuesday, compared with around 0.1 percent in early October when the BoJ announced its latest monetary easing steps.
There also remain challenges of slowing export growth and falling industrial production on weakening overseas demand, while the expiration of government incentives for environmentally friendly cars has also hit demand at home.
"As for private consumption, demand for some goods has suffered a reverse after the sharp increase seen previously", the BoJ warned.
"Production has recently declined slightly and business sentiment has also been somewhat weak, particularly in the manufacturing sector," the central bank said.
Japan, which heavily relies on exports of cars, electronics and machines, has been hit by a strong yen, which makes its goods less competitive abroad and erodes companies' overseas profits when repatriated.
However, the unit has been stable recently after hitting 15-year highs against the dollar, giving some respite to the export sector and easing pressure on the economy.
There is therefore "less urgency" for the BoJ to take further action, Mizuho Securities chief market economist Yasunari Ueno told Dow Jones Newswires.
While the central bank's quarterly Tankan survey of business sentiment last week showed confidence had weakened for the first time in nearly two years, the decline had been less than expected by many economists.
Japan remains mired in crippling deflation, as falling prices prompt consumers to hold off on purchase decisions in the expectation of further price drops, clouding future corporate investment.
Economic growth in the July-September quarter was earlier this month revised up to an annualised 4.5 percent thanks to a rush to beat expiring government incentives, but expectations are for a contraction in the fourth quarter.
"GDP will almost certainly fall in the current quarter but we are increasingly concerned that it may drop further in the first three months of 2011 as well, meaning that Japan will technically be in recession again," consultancy Capital Economics said in a recent research note.

description.hltext_display: Lawan Malaysia, Ini Tekad Firman Utina
description.content:
Firman Utina (kanan) berduel dengan pesepakbola Malaysia Safee dalam pertandingan Grup A AFF Suzuki Cup 2010, Jakarta. TEMPO/Aditia Noviansyah
TEMPO Interaktif, Jakarta -Pemain gelandang tim nasional Firman Utina mengaku kondisi kesehatannya mulai pulih dari cedera. Ia pun siap membela Skuad Merah Putih saat menghadapi Malaysia pada leg pertama final Piala AFF Suzuki 2010 yang akan digelar di Stadion Nasional Bukit Jalil, Kuala Lumpur, Malaysia, Minggu (26/12). Pemain Sriwijaya FC ini bertekad akan membawa Laskar Garuda memetik kemenangan di kandang Malaysia.
"Insyallah bisa turun main besok dan bisa membawa Indonesia menang,"kata Firman usai latihan di lapangan tim nasional, Gelora Bung Karno, Senayan, Jakarta, Rabu (22/12).
Selama cedera, pemain kelahiran Manado ini mengaku terus menjalani latihan terapi dan juga latihan beban bersama tim ahli psikoterapis. "Latihannya tidak dipaksakan," katanya.
Pada laga final di kandang Malaysia nanti, menurut Firman, yang terpenting adalah menyiapkan mental. "Kita tahu sporter Malaysia bagus provokasinya. Tapi, saya percaya rekan-rekan lain bisa mengatasi kondisi ini," kata pemain yang biasa berperan sebagai kapten tim nasional menggantikan Bambang Pamungkas.
Pemain bek, Hamka Hamzah juga optimistis tim Merah Putih di bawah pelatih Alfred Riedl bisa memenangkan partai final sekaligus menjadi juara AFF. Mengenai komentarnya bermain di kandang Malaysia, pemain Persipura ini mengaku tidak takut. "Kenapa mesti takut main di kandang lawan, sekarang komposisi pemain kita berbeda jadi enggak ada yang perlu ditakuti," kata Hamka.

description.hltext_display: Albert de Monaco: un mariage retransmis sur écran géant
description.content: Pour le mariage du prince Albert de de sa fiancée, les portes du Palais de Monaco resteront exceptionnellement ouvertes afin que près de 4000 personnes puissent assister à la cérémonie sur écrans géants.

description.hltext_display: Sears Canada says Driscoll to succeed Ravas as CFO
description.content:
NEW YORK (Reuters) - Retailer Sears Canada Inc named Sharon Driscoll on Tuesday as its new finance chief to replace CFO Allen Ravas, who is returning to Sears Holdings to work at a California subsidiary.
Driscoll has served as a senior vice president of finance since November 2008. Ravas, CFO since October of that year, will serve as the Chief Administrative Officer of Orchard Supply Hardware of San Jose, California.
Sears Canada, 90 percent owned by Sears Holdings, owns a network of 196 corporate stores, 260 dealer stores and 33 home improvement showrooms. Last month it reported a 61 percent drop in third-quarter profit, results its CEO called "disappointing."
Sears Canada's shares closed at C$19.14 on Tuesday on the Toronto Stock Exchange.
(Reporting by Nick Zieminski; Editing by Muralikumar Anantharaman)

description.hltext_display: Vaticano esclarece polêmica
description.content:
Bento XVI, segundo o Vaticano, foi mal-entendido por alguns comentaristas
FOTO: REUTERS
MATÉRIAS RELACIONADAS
Cidade do Vaticano - O Vaticano esclareceu ontem os controversos comentários feitos pelo papa Bento XVI sobre o uso de preservativos. Segundo o Vaticano, de modo algum o pontífice disse que o uso da camisinha poderia ser justificado como uma forma de se evitar a gravidez. A Congregação para a Doutrina da Fé, órgão da Igreja Católica responsável por difundir a doutrina católica e defender a tradição, divulgou comunicado ontem afirmando que alguns comentaristas entenderam erroneamente os comentários do papa. As declarações de Bento XVI estão em um livro lançado no mês passado, "Light of the World" ("Luz do mundo", em tradução literal).
No livro, Bento XVI diz que o uso da camisinha é aceitável "em certas situações". O papa dá como exemplo homens que se prostituem, dizendo que nesse caso o uso da proteção seria "um ato de responsabilidade moral", ainda que a camisinha na opinião dele "não seja realmente o caminho para lidar com o mal da infecção" pela aids. Na ocasião, a declaração contida no livro foi elogiada, por exemplo, pela agência da ONU que trabalha para evitar a disseminação da aids.
"A ideia que das palavras de Bento XVI se possa deduzir que em alguns casos seja lícito recorrer ao uso do preservativo para evitar gestações indesejadas é totalmente arbitrária e não responde nem a suas palavras nem a seu pensamento", esclareceu a congregação, que foi liderada até 2005 pelo Papa, quando ainda era o cardeal.
A congregação atestou que o pensamento do papa "foi instrumentalizado para objetivos e interesses estranhos ao sentido de suas palavras, que fica evidente quando se leem por inteiro os capítulos onde trata da sexualidade humana". Segundo a congregação, "o interesse do Santo Padre aparece claro: reencontrar a grandeza do projeto de Deus sobre a sexualidade, evitando a banalização difundida atualmente".
O Vaticano vinha sofrendo pressão de teólogos conservadores para divulgar um comunicado esclarecendo o ponto. Houve dúvidas sobre se os comentários do papa poderiam representar uma ruptura da postura sobre os preservativos.

description.hltext_display: 韓軍保持最高警戒狀態以防北韓挑釁 (朝鮮日報)
description.content:
據悉，韓國軍隊20日實施延坪島砲擊演習前後，北韓在西海岸附近地區增設了地對艦、地對空導彈，部分地對艦導彈甚至上到發射架等出現發射跡象，韓國軍方遂加強了警戒態勢。
韓國政府消息人士21日表示：“北韓把SA-2地對空導彈和蠶式地對艦導彈等增設在西海岸登山岬一帶。因為出現要發射部分地對艦導彈的跡象，韓國的驅逐艦等艦艇一度駛離北韓導彈的射程範圍。”據悉，北韓地對艦導彈的射程為83至95公里。
前蘇聯製造的SA-2地對空導彈的射程為30至40公里，能夠威脅到在西海北方界線（NLL）附近執行任務的韓方戰斗機。北韓沒有撤回部署在延坪島附近的 Gaemeori地區、白翎島及江華島北側的多管火箭砲，而且海岸炮也打開炮門，進入射擊態勢。韓國軍方正在密切關注這一情況。
韓國軍方認為，當天下午重新點亮距北方僅1.5公里的愛妓峰燈塔，可能會遭到北韓的攻擊。因此，軍方已經向管轄愛妓峰的部隊和西海5島、最前方非軍事區（DMZ）的部隊下令繼續保持最高警戒態勢。當天，韓國國防部長金寬鎮向國會國防委彙報工作時說：“如果北韓炮擊愛妓峰燈塔，將果敢回擊，拔掉北韓的火力點。” 韓國軍方還在研究各種應對方案，以防北韓對西海5島、非軍事區（DMZ）、首都圈和東海等地“聲東擊西”。自22日起，韓國海軍1艦隊將在東海實施為期4 天的機動演習。另外，擁有各種彈道導彈和巡航導彈（射程180至1000公里）的美軍導彈司令部也參加了20日實施的延坪島軍演，針對北韓進一步挑釁、引發戰爭的情況，做好了打擊北韓核設施等戰略目標的准備。

description.hltext_display: Actor of Broadway musical Spider-Man, Turn Off the Dark- falls 30feet, hospitalized
description.content:
Jagjit Singh launches Radio City's Musical-E-Azam
Rishi Kapoor and Neetu Singh's musical surprise on Chhote Ustaad
If Aamir Khan can play musical instruments, painting will be child's play for him - Salman Khan
Sports cars are not about speed - Actor Ranbir Kapoor
MUMBAI: An actor on the set of the Broadway musical Spider-Man, Turn Off the Dark fell about 30 feet during a preview performance and has been hospitalized. He was performing an aerial stunt when he fell.
He fell about seven minutes before the end of the performance, and the show was stopped. Firefighters were called to the Foxwoods Theatre and the actor was taken to Bellevue Hospital with minor injuries. However, the actor’s name has not been released but the buzz doing the rounds is that his name is Christopher Tierney and that he is the main aerialist and performs stunts for the roles of Spider-Man.
Prior to this, there have been cases of three other accidents where actors have been injured in the same production. The musical was conceived by Tony and co-writer Julie Taymor and U2's Bono and The Edge, who wrote the music.

description.hltext_display: Ministrul Sănătăţii, Cseke Attila, vrea să-şi subordoneze Casa de Asigurări
description.content:
/ FOTO: REALITATEA TV Imaginea 1/1 Banii din sănătate - o dispută cu o miză de 4 miliarde de euro. Ministrul Cseke Attila vrea ca fondurile Casei Naţionale de Asigurări de Sănătate să nu mai fie colectate de fisc, şi să ajungă la minister.� Premierul spune însă că banii de la Sănătate trebuie strânşi în continuare de ANAF.
"Atâta timp cât în accepţitunea societăţii răspunzător pentru sistemul sanitar este Ministerul Sănătăţii cred eu că este normal ca atribuţiile de coordonare a problemelor cum se finanţează acest sistem, care sunt legate strict azi de Casa de Asigurări de Sănătate să fie în coordonarea sau în subordinea Ministerului Sănătăţii", a spus Cseke Attila.
Premierul a susţinut însă că banii trebuie strânşi în continuare de ANAF fiindcă această instituţie are şi instrumentele necesare pentru executarea silită a rău-platnicilor.
În prezent, 6,7 milioane de români plătesc contribuţiile la asigurările de sănătate în timp ce alte aproape 11 milioane beneficiază de servicii medicale fără să plătească. De anul viitor vor plăti şi pensionarii cu venituri peste 740 de lei, iar numărul celor obligaţi să achite asigurările de sănătate va devenit aproape egal cu al celor care se bucură de gratuitate.
În 2009, la fondul de sănătate s-au colectat aproximativ 15 miliarde lei. Sumă insuficientă pentru a susţine sistemul sărăcit şi de fraude. Preşedintele Băsescu a cerut noi măsuri pentru o cheltuire mai eficientă a banilor de la Casa de Asigurări de Sănătate.
Contribuţia la asigurările de sănătate este de 5,5 la sută pentru persoanele fizice şi de 5,2% pentru angajatori. În 1999, când a fost lansat sistemul, contribuţia lunară era de 7% la sută pentru angajat şi 7% pentru angajator.
� �

description.hltext_display: Clark bags treble at Canterbury
description.content:
Tim Clark brought up his 20th city winner of the season when taking riding honours with a treble at Canterbury on Wednesday.
The meeting saw a number of promising three-year-olds step out including Flying Empress and Angelican who formed part of Clark's winning treble.
The Group One-winning hoop went to Canterbury believing he had a good book of rides and left content with his day's work.
"All three of them were quite impressive and look like they will go on and win more races for sure," Clark said.
Clark started his winning momentum on the Bart Cummings-trained Angelican who led all the way to win the TJ's Champagne Bar Handicap (1250m).
Angelican's victory brought up an early double for Cummings after Think Ahead took out the opening race.
Later, Clark combined with Joe Pride to score on Hanzo Steel and then the impressive three-year-old filly Flying Empress.
Flying Empress had won her only previous start in July at Canterbury and kept her unbeaten record intact with a dominant return.
"She was most impressive," Clark said of Flying Empress after the Grand Pavilion Handicap (1200m).
"She had to do a bit more work than I would have liked to cross to the front but it was pretty soft on the line.
"She's going places for sure and she handles all conditions."
Pride said he would let the filly tell him where to go but admitted he was looking at the autumn carnival or even the Brisbane winter.
"I will make a prediction, she's very good," Pride said.
"To lead like that and not at a trot, to go quite quickly and then kick away at the end first-up was a very, very good performance."
Clark held Angelican in high regard heading into Wednesday's maiden and was delighted the son of God's Own was able to break though at his fourth start.
Angelican took up the running in the 1550m event and stacked them up before kicking strongly to win by 1-3/4 lengths.
"I had a bit to do with him early on and peggedhim as being a pretty nice horse," Clark said.
"I'm sure he's destined for better things now."
Only three riders got into the winners' circle on the seven-race card with Nash Rawiller booting home a double as well as Christian Reith to go with Clark's treble.
Reith partnered the well-bred Steps In Time who was impressive winning the theraces.com.au Handicap (1250m) on debut by 1-1/4 lengths.
"It's a pleasure to ride V8s," Reith said of the John O'Shea-trained runner.
Steps In Time is by Danehill Dancer out of Rare Insight who is a stakeswinning half-sister to Group One winners Glamour Puss and Vision And Power.

description.hltext_display: Chesapeake Announces Completion of $15.0 Million Private Placement
description.content:
VANCOUVER, BRITISH COLUMBIA--(Marketwire - Dec. 21, 2010) - Chesapeake Gold Corp. ("Chesapeake") (CDNX:CKG.V) is pleased to announce that it has completed the $15.0 million brokered private placement (the "Private Placement") of 1,463,414 common shares of Chesapeake at $10.25 per share announced in its news release of December 9, 2010.
The Private Placement was conducted on a best efforts agency basis by a syndicate co-led by Byron Securities Limited and GMP Securities L.P. and including Mackie Research Capital Corporation (collectively, the "Agents"). The Company paid the Agents a cash commission equal to 5.5% of the aggregate gross proceeds of the Private Placement.
The common shares of Chesapeake issued pursuant to the Private Placement are subject to a hold period which expires on April 22, 2011. In connection with the Private Placement, two insiders of Chesapeake completed a "gypsy swap" transaction pursuant to which they sold through the Pure trading facilities of CNSX Markets Inc. an aggregate of 682,927 common shares of Chesapeake at a price of $10.25 per share and subsequently utilized the proceeds from the sale to purchase, through the Private Placement, an equal number of common shares of Chesapeake at $10.25 per share.
The Private Placement is subject to final approval of the TSX Venture Exchange.
About Chesapeake:
Chesapeake is focused on developing its flagship Metates Project in Mexico. The Company's management team has a strong track record of mineral discovery and mine development in Latin America. M3 Engineering and Technology of Tucson, Arizona recently completed a positive Preliminary Economic Assessment ("PEA") on the Metates project in Durango state. The PEA forecasts a 27 year mine life with the expected recovery of 14.8 million ounces of gold, 391 million ounces of silver and 2.4 billion pounds of zinc. During the first seven years of full production, the PEA estimates average annual production of 600,000 ounces of gold and 22 million ounces of silver with low cash costs and fast payback of capital. Net proceeds from the private placement will fund the completion of a Pre-feasibility study in late 2011.
For more information, please visit our website at www.chesapeakegold.com.
CHESAPEAKE GOLD CORP
P. Randy Reifel, President
CAUTIONARY DISCLAIMER - FORWARD LOOKING STATEMENTS
This news release contains "forward-looking information" within the meaning of applicable Canadian securities legislation. Such forward-looking statements and information herein include, but are not limited to, statements regarding the proposed use of proceeds from the Private Placement and plans and prospects regarding the Metates Project. The Company does not intend to, and does not assume any obligation to update such forward-looking statements or information, other than as required by applicable law.
Forward-looking statements or information involve known and unknown risks, uncertainties and other factors that may cause the actual results, level of activity, performance or achievements of Chesapeake and its operations to be materially different from those expressed or implied by such statements. Such factors include, among others: ability to finance mine development, fluctuations in the prices of gold, silver and zinc, fluctuations in the currency markets (particularly the Mexican peso, Canadian dollar and U.S. dollar); changes in national and local governments, legislation, taxation, controls, regulations and political or economic developments in Canada and Mexico; operating or technical difficulties in mineral exploration, development and mining activities; risks and hazards of mineral exploration, development and mining (including environmental hazards, industrial accidents, unusual or unexpected geological conditions, pressures, cave-ins and flooding); inadequate insurance, or inability to obtain insurance; availability of and costs associated with mining inputs and labour; the speculative nature of mineral exploration and development, diminishing quantities or grades of mineral reserves as properties are mined; risks in obtaining necessary licenses and permits, and challenges to the Company's title to properties; as well as those factors described in the section "risk factors" contained in the Company's most recent MD&A filed with the Canadian securities regulatory authorities. description.hltext_display: Kup kralja: Bilbao zaustavio Barcelonu
description.content:
24SI - Fudbaleri Barcelone i Athletic Bilbao odigrali su bez golova (0:0) na "Camp Nou" u prvom meču 1/16 finala španskog kupa Kralja.
Pepe Guardiola odlučio je da meč počne bez Lionela Messija, kao i bez Davida Ville, čime je pomogao gostima da lake odbrane svoju mrežu. U drugom meču večeri Cordoba i Deportivo odigrali su 1:1. Gosti su poveli iz penala u 18. minutu golom Rikija, a konačan rezultat postavio je Diaz u 70. minutu.Preostalih pet duela biće odigrani u danas, a sastaju se Athletico Madrid - Espanol, Real Madrid - Levante, Sevilla - Malaga, Betis - Getafe i Almeria - Mallorca.

description.hltext_display: Danskar rekordnegativa till euron
description.content:
Köpenhamn/TT-Ritzau
Danskarna har aldrig varit så negativa till euron som nu, enligt Danske Banks kvartalsvisa opinionsmätningar. På ett kvartal har gapet mellan nej och ja vuxit från 5 till 13 procentenheter.
Nu säger 42 procent av danskarna ja eller kanske ja till att införa EU-valutan, medan 55 procent säger nej.
Mätningen gjordes under de två första veckorna i december.

description.hltext_display: 平壤宣傳戰 辯護砲擊延坪島 (法新社)
description.content:
（法新社首爾22日電） 南韓官員今天表示，北韓正增加對南韓民間團體與企業的宣傳活動，為上月致命的延坪島砲擊事件辯護。
負責南北韓事務的首爾統一部發言人李鍾株（LeeJong-Joo）說，北韓本月發送「大量傳真訊息」給宗教、民間組織，以及在北韓經商的企業。
她告訴記者，文宣譴責南韓挑起11月23日致命的延坪島砲擊事件，呼籲團體與企業發起反政府活動。
李鍾株說：「自從12月6日散布第一份文宣後，北韓仍持續傳送文宣給許多貿易公司。」但她沒有提到有多少機構收到文宣。
「朝鮮日報」（Chosun Ilbo）報導，約80家公司與民間團體收到平壤發送文宣，內容稱砲擊延坪島與南韓軍事演習「挑釁」有關。
平壤表示，發動砲擊是因為南韓海軍陸戰隊在延坪島實彈演習發射的砲彈，落到了北韓海域。
北韓拒絕承認韓戰後劃定的兩韓黃海邊界，宣稱南韓前線島嶼周圍海域為北韓所有。（譯者：中央社張曉雯）

description.hltext_display: Rafa Nadal y María José Martínez lideran los equipos nacionales de Copa Davis y Copa Federación
description.content:
Los capitanes españoles de Copa Davis, Albert Costa, y Copa Federación, Miguel Margets, dieron la lista de jugadores para la temporada 2011 que lideran Rafa Nadal y María José Martínez, respectivamente, en una rueda de prensa que tuvo lugar en el Club Esportiu Laietà.
Costa, campeón de la Davis en su debut como seleccionador nacional en 2009, volverá a confiar en el bloque con el que conquistó en el Palau Sant Jordi la cuarta 'Ensaladera' para la 'Armada' ante la República Checa, con la única novedad de la entrada en la lista de Guillermo García-López.
Así, Rafa Nadal, número uno del mundo, volverá a liderar un equipo en el que también están incluidos David Ferrer, Fernando Verdasco, Feliciano López, Nicolás Almagro, Albert Montañés, Juan Carlos Ferrero, Tommy Robredo, Marcel Granollers y el ya citado Guillermo García-López.
El ex tenista ilerdense lamentó que a pesar de haber hecho una amplia selección con diez jugadores "como siempre se quedarán muchos de mucho nivel fuera" y destacó la inclusión en el equipo del albaceteño García-López.
"Ha entrado porque merecía estar por muchas cosas. Ganó en Bangkok a Nadal y está entre los 35 mejores del mundo. El año pasado ya quise meterle, pero no pudo ser", apuntó a casi tres meses de la primera ronda contra Bélgica en Charleroi (4-6 de marzo).
Así, y con una lista que queda "abierta" para futuras inclusiones, espera llegar al "objetivo anual" de hacerse con la 'Ensaladera' aunque matizó que, este año, el cuadro es "bastante duro". "Tendremos eliminatorias fuera, nada fácil, pero cuento con el apoyo de estos jugadores para triunfar", manifestó.
"Lucharemos por repetir lo que ya se ha hecho en cuatro ocasiones con todas las ganas", aseveró el capitán español, quien hizo un buen balance de este 2010. "Mejor no puede ser. Hemos ganado muchos torneos, tres Grand Slam, estamos entre los mejores y, quizá, la nota no tan positiva sea la Davis", espetó. "Se están haciendo resultados que se escapan de lo normal", añadió.
En este sentido, el jugador Nicolás Almagro apuntó que pocos países gozan de la salud del tenis español. "Estamos haciendo historia, y ser titular en Davis va a ser duro. Solo espero poner las cosas difíciles al capitán", espetó. Para Albert Montañés, es un "orgullo" formar parte de la lista inicial de seleccionados.
MARGETS: "SI VAMOS UNIDOS, PODEMOS".
Por otra parte, 'Mico' Margets volvió a confiar en María José Martínez, Carla Suárez, Arantxa Parra, Anabel Medina, Lourdes Domínguez y Nuria Llagostera para buscar el ascenso al Grupo Mundial ante Estonia en Tallinn (5-6 de febrero de 2011).
Las grandes novedades son la convocatoria de Laura Pous y Beatriz García. "Laura entra por pasar de un ránking 700 al 108. Lo ha hecho muy bien después de estar un tiempo parada. Y Bea me sorprendió con su victoria sobre Clijsters en Marbella", precisó.
De cara a esta temporada, aseguró que el objetivo será "recuperar la categoría perdida en 2008". "Será complicado ante Estonia, tienen a una número uno como Kanepi, pero después de ella hay un salto tremendo de calidad. Afrontaremos con garantías esta eliminatoria", espetó.
Como balance de este 2010, apuntó que ha sido "un año positivo". "Es muy importante tener a seis jugadoras en el cuadro final del Open de Australia, y María José Martínez ganó el Open de Roma. Hacía diez años que no se ganaba un torneo de esta categoría", celebró el seleccionador femenino.

description.hltext_display: Etrion Completes Ruffano Solar Park in Italy
description.content:
{"s" : "etx.to","k" : "a00,a50,b00,b60,c10,g00,h00,l10,p20,t10,v00","o" : "","j" : ""}
GENEVA, SWITZERLAND--(Marketwire - Dec. 22, 2010) - Etrion Corporation ("Etrion" or the "Company") (Toronto:ETX.TO)(Toronto:ETX.TO), an independent solar power producer, announces the completion of the Ruffano solar park in Puglia, Italy.
Marco Northland, Etrion's CEO, commented, "We are pleased to announce the completion of another solar park in Italy. We continue to execute on our projects under construction and expect to exit the year with almost 50 MW operational."
The Ruffano park has a total capacity of 1 MW and is expected to produce over 1.7 million kilowatt hours ("kWh") of clean electricity and more than 600,000 euros of earnings before interest, taxes, depreciation and amortization ("EBITDA") per year.
The project benefits from the 2010 feed-in-tariff of 0.346 euros per kWh plus a market price of approximately 0.08 euros per kWh.
The Italian feed-in-tariff is a premium purchase price for solar electricity that is guaranteed by the Italian government for 20 years from the start of operations.
The 1 MW Ruffano park is a ground-based solar PV power plant using SunPower's high-efficiency PV modules and single axis tracker technology with Siemens inverters.
Centrobanca, an Italian bank, provided 83% of the financing for the project with a 17.5-year, non-recourse loan.
About Etrion
Etrion Corporation develops, builds, owns and operates solar power plants in Italy. Etrion currently owns 42 megawatts (MW) of operational, ground-based solar photovoltaic (PV) power plants, has 16 MW of solar parks under construction and approximately 200 MW of solar development pipeline in Italy. Etrion is listed on the Toronto Stock Exchange and the NASDAQ OMX Stockholm exchange (ticker symbol "ETX").
For additional information, please visit the Company's website at www.etrion.com.
Forward-Looking Information:
This press release contains certain "forward-looking information". All statements, other than statements of historical fact, that address activities, events or developments that the Company believes, expects or anticipates will or may occur in the future (including, without limitation, statements relating to the Ruffano solar park, the production capacity thereof and the expected cash flow therefrom) constitute forward-looking information. This forward-looking information reflects the current expectations or beliefs of the Company based on information currently available to the Company as well as certain assumptions, including, without limitation, assumptions as to the price at which the Company will be able to sell electricity from the project and an assumption that the Company will be able to realize EBITDA margins for the project that are equivalent to the average margins for similar projects. Forward-looking information is subject to a number of significant risks and uncertainties and other factors that may cause the actual results of the Company to differ materially from those discussed in the forward-looking information, and even if such actual results are realized or substantially realized, there can be no assurance that they will have the expected consequences to, or effects on the Company. Factors that could cause actual results or events to differ materially from current expectations include, but are not limited to, the failure to obtain necessary regulatory and other approvals.
Any forward-looking information speaks only as of the date on which it is made and, except as may be required by applicable securities laws, the Company disclaims any intent or obligation to update any forward-looking information, whether as a result of new information, future events or results or otherwise. Although the Company believes that the assumptions inherent in the forward-looking information are reasonable, forward-looking information is not a guarantee of future performance and accordingly undue reliance should not be put on such information due to the inherent uncertainty therein.
