description.hltext_display: Vad har kvinnor i handväskan?
description.content:
Vid en konsert nyligen langade en väninna upp ungefär ett kilo nybakade kanelbullar ur väskan när vi sammanstrålade i pausen. Hon hade kommit direkt från sin vän kaféinnehavaren som höll på att stänga butiken och fått bröd över. Mumsande konstaterade vi att väninnan just brutit mot budordet ”Du ska icke bära färskt vetebröd i din väska”.
En annan scen några årstider längre bort: Tre fruntimmer, en filt och ett parasoll anländer till vattenbrynet en varm julidag på Skrea strand.
Mannen som är närmaste strandgranne tittar med illa dolt milt överseende på när tanterna försöker förankra parasollet i den lösa sanden vilket visar sig svårt. Ett av fruntimren greppar då resolut sin handväska, tar ur densamma fram en slägga och bankar ner parasollet så stadigt att det i princip kunde stått kvar ännu. Strandgrannen ser sedan framför sig med tom blick en lång stund. Kanske funderande över ett eller annat budord. Väninnan är inte beväpnad i vanliga fall. Orsaken till den släggbestyckade väskan var ett pågående renoveringsprojekt som krävde vissa nyinvesteringar i verktygsbeståndet så därför hade hon just varit och köpt en behändig liten bra-att-ha-slägga. Vilket ju visade sig vara ett lyckokast (med liten slägga). Men världsrekord i fullproppad väska innehar jag nog själv. Jag skulle tillverka en liten prydlig väska som passade ihop med en ny kalasklänning. I ett moment av tillverkningen skulle man vränga hela skapelsen ut och in för att sy ihop botten. Dessvärre fastnade projektet i det läget. Det gick inte att få upp blixtlåset utan hjälp av: 1. make och 2. verktyg som bara maken kan hitta i den osannolika röran i pannrummet och dessutom bemästra. Medan räddningsaktionen pågick slog det mig att nu hade min handväska fodret, alltså insidan, mot allting. Hallands Nyheters redaktion, Fästningen, Falkenbergs blåsorkester, Carl Bildt, Stampens huvudkontor, soppsleven som jag blev av med i samband med ett knytkalas våren 97, Malmö FF med tränare, varenda mobiltelefonabonnemangsförsäljare jag någonsin snäst av utanför Coop Forum, alla udda strumpor som försvunnit i tvätten, Andromedagalaxen och de där växelpengarna jag aldrig hittar när jag ska parkera. Med mera. Och absolut ingenting fanns utanför min väska.
Äntligen rådde lite ordning i tillvaron.
I den stunden hade jag kunna ge ett uttömmande svar om du frågat vad jag egentligen har i handväskan. Nämligen: ”Rubbet!”

description.hltext_display: Омбудсмен обратилась к министру образования в связи подготовкой школ к зиме
美國人口破3億 可能影響總統大選
description.content:
美國商務部人口普查局局長葛洛福斯21日在華府公布2010年普查結果，後面看板秀出目前美國人口已突破三億，總數為3億874萬5538人。不過，美國人口增加幅度卻是1930年代以來最小的十年。
美聯社
美國商務部人口普查局（Census Bureau）21日公布2010年普查結果，美國人口已突破三億，今年四月一日總數為3億874萬5538人，較2000年的2億8142萬1906人增加9.7%，是1930年代經濟大蕭條以來人口增加幅度最小的十年。
歐巴馬選舉人票恐少6張
美國憲法規定每十年進行人口普查，據以調整各州聯邦眾議員席次，人口普查局局長葛洛福（Robert Groves）指出，依據最新普查數字，十八個州眾議員席次將有增減，重新分配的席次為十二席，2012年年底的國會選舉就適用新選區。
這次增加席次的州多數傾向支持共和黨，一般認為，對未來共和黨眾院選情是利多，同時由於各州總統選舉人票數也會隨著眾議員席次增減，也可能影響2012年總統大選。如果把新的席次分配套用在2008年總統大選，歐巴馬得到的選舉人票將減少六張。
德州暴增4席眾議員席次
眾議員席次增加最多的是德州，由32席增為36席，佛羅里達州增加2 席，華盛頓、內華達及喬治亞等六個州各增1席。紐約州及俄亥俄州各減2席，麻州、賓州及紐澤西等八個州各減1席。
葛洛福表示，數十年來美國人口分布持續朝南部及西部移動，這次普查發現東北部及中西部人口成長幅度在4%以下，南部及西部則為14%左右。1940年以來，南部及西部各州增加的眾議員席次多達79席。
加州居民超過3725萬人
現在美國人口最多的是加州，居民超過3725萬人，人口最小的懷俄明州則只有56萬多人。過去十年間，除了密西根州人口減少0.6%，美國各州人口都增加，內華達州增幅三成五居冠。

description.hltext_display: Galatasaray'ın 2. turdaki rakipleri
description.content: Kupada son 16 takım arasına kalmayı başaran sarı-kırmızılı ekip, 2. turda (K) Grubu'nda İspanya'nın Asefa Estudiantes, ek Cumhuriyeti'nden CEZ Nymburk ve İtalya temsilcisi Pepsi Caserta ile eşleşti. Drder takımdan oluşan 4 grupta yapılacak 2. tur maları 18 Ocak-1 Mart 2011 tarihleri arasında oynanacak ve gruplarını ilk 2 sırada bitirecek ekipler eyrek finale ykselecek. AA

description.hltext_display: Spaniards pin hopes on lottery during austere Christmas
description.content:
Cars pass under hanging Christmas lights in a street of Madrid on December 15. Spaniards are cutting back on food and gifts this year as an economic downturn grinds on but ticket sales for an annual Christmas lottery have bucked the trend as they look to the world's biggest payout for relief from the crisis.
Spaniards are cutting back on food and gifts this year as an economic downturn grinds on but ticket sales for an annual Christmas lottery have bucked the trend as they look to the world's biggest payout for relief from the crisis.
The State Lottery and Betting organisation estimates sales for Wednesday's draw for "El Gordo" or "The Fat One", as the lottery is called, will match or be slightly higher than last year's total of 2.7 billion euros (3.5 billion dollars).
Alberto Espinosa, a 38-year-old civil servant who has seen his salary cut this year as part of government belt-tightening measures, said he would buy less tickets this year but would still take part in the draw.
"Buying 'El Gordo' at Christmas is a tradition but I think that when times are tough as they are now the dreams are different," he said as he stood in line to buy tickets outside a state lottery office in central Madrid.
"Before you would buy tickets with the dream of going on a long trip or buying an expensive car, now you dream of being able to live peacefully without worrying about making it to the end of the month."
While other lotteries have bigger individual top prizes, "El Gordo" is ranked as the world's richest for the total sum paid out in thousands of individual prizes -- 2.32 billion euros this year.
Manuel Rivero, a 67-year-old retired shopkeeper, said he plans to spend 100 euros on five tickets -- one for himself and two each for his two sons who he said are struggling to make their monthly mortgage payments.
"One son is unemployed, the other's wife is not working. It's a silly hope but if they were to win, this would solve a lot of problems," he said as he stood in line in the cold to buy the tickets at the Dona Manolita, a lottery vending shop which has become a Spanish institution since it opened in 1931.
The steady sales for the Christmas lottery bucks the trend among Spanish consumers who are tightening their belts this holiday season, spending less for the third year in a row according to the Federation for Independent Consumers.
It estimates shoppers will spend an average 674 euros over the festive period, down from 728 euros last year and 814 euros in 2008 when the collapse of a property bubble plunged Spain into recession and caused the unemployment rate to soar to 20 percent, the highest level in the European Union.
"The fact that over the past three years consumption has dropped 24 percent during the holidays demonstrates the damage that the crisis is causing to numerous families who must cut their spending even more at Christmas to make it until the end of the month," said the head of the federation, Agustina Laguna.
Celeste Consuegra, a 48-year-old retirement home worker whose husband has been unemployed for over a year, said her family had decided to only buy gifts for children this year to save money.
"It is more important for the little ones to get gifts, they get very excited, we adults understand the situation better," she said as she left a downtown Madrid department store carrying a bag with toys wrapped in colourful paper for her children and nephews.
Others doing their last-minute shopping on the streets of the Spanish capital -- which this season will have 3.1 million fewer holiday lights as part of municipal belt-tightening -- also spoke of buying less expensive gifts or second-hand items.
One of Spain's most popular web sites for used goods, Doctortrade.com, estimates average spending on used goods per person these holidays will be 100 euros (132 dollars), a 150 percent jump over last year.
"This is going to be a recycled Christmas," said Doctortrade.com director Manuel de Timoteo.

description.hltext_display: Guiné-Conacri:Alpha Condé investido hoje 1º Presidente eleito
description.content:
| Imprimir Alpha Condé, que liderou durante décadas a oposição na Guiné-Conacri, será hoje investido presidente, seis semanas após as primeiras eleições livres na história da antiga colónia francesa, independente desde 1958.
Com 72 anos, Alpha Condé, que vai governar pela primeira vez, prometeu «uma mudança radical das práticas de governação após 50 anos de ditaduras».
Segundo a televisão nacional, para a cerimónia são aguardados quinze chefes de estado, tendo sido anunciadas as presenças de Malam Bacai Sanha, da Guiné-Bissau, Abdoulaye Wade, do Senegal, Amadou Toumani Touré, do Mali, Ernest Koroma, da Serra Leoa, e Ellen Johnson Sirleaf, da Libéria.
Diário Digital / Lusa

description.hltext_display: ‘Çocuklar Gülsün Diye’ ünlüler çanta tasarladı GALERİ
description.content:
‘Çocuklar Gülsün Diye’ kampanyasına destek için ünlü isimler, yaratıcılıklarını konuşturdu
Foto Galeri
Ünlülerin rengârenk tasarladığı birbirinden güzel çantaların satışından elde edilen gelirle, tüm çocuklar gülecek.
HT MAGAZİN
Avrupa'nın bir numaralı çanta markası Eastpak'in tüm Avrupa genelinde eş zamanlı yürüttüğü 'Eastpak Artist Studio' projesi kapsamında ünlü isimler bir araya geldi ve 'Çocuklar Gülsün Diye' kampanyasına bağışlanmak üzere özgün tasarımlar yaptı.
Galeri için tıklayınız...
Bahar Korçan'ın başkanlığını üstlendiği 'Moda Tasarımcıları Derneği'nden aralarında Bahar Korçan, Atıl Kutoğlu, Tuvana Büyükçınar, Cengiz Abazoğlu, Özgür Masur gibi isimlerin bulunduğu 19 ünlü tasarımcı ve Beren Saat, Zerrin Tekindor, Derya Baykal, Pınar Altuğ, Gülben Ergen, Başak Fransez, Deniz Marşan ve Tülin Kermen gibi sanat ve moda dünyasından isimler, çantalara kendi yaratıcılıklarını yansıttılar. Ünlü kâğıt tasarımcısı Deniz Doğruyol da tasarımı yapılan çantalara özel isimlikler hazırlayarak projeye destek verdi. 20- 27 Aralık tarihleri arasında Anadolu Yakası'ndaki Palladium AVM'de özel camekânlar içerisinde sergilenecek çantalardan elde edilen tüm gelir, kampanyaya bağışlanacak.

description.hltext_display: Belinda Stronach resigns from board of Magna autoparts giant
description.content:
AURORA, Ont. - Belinda Stronach is resigning from the board of Magna International Inc. (TSX:MG), the Canadian autoparts giant founded by her father Frank Stronach.
Belinda Stronach, who was for a short time chief executive of Magna before she became a member of Parliament, had been a director and executive vice-chairman of the board.
The Stronach family trust remains the largest individual shareholder of Magna International but Frank Stronach relinquished his voting control earlier this year.
The company didn't give a reason for Belinda Stronach's decision to quit the Magna board, effective Dec. 31, but said the composition of the board is under review.
Although her time in Parliament was short, Stronach was one of Canada's most high-profile politicians while representing the Ontario riding of Newmarket-Aurora from 2004 to 2008.
She was originally elected as a Conservative but created a stir when she switched parties to become a member of Paul Martin's Liberal cabinet.
In 2007, Stronach was diagnosed with breast cancer and later had mastectomy surgery.
She has sponsored a chair in breast cancer reconstructive surgery at the Toronto General and Western Hospital Foundation and created a charitable foundation in her name that focuses on a number of issues.

description.hltext_display: VILLE EN FÊTE ZURICH SE MET SUR SON TRENTE ET UN
description.content:
VILLE EN FÊTE
ZURICH SE MET SUR SON TRENTE ET UN
Deux cent mille spectateurs, et moi et moi et moi… La plus grande fête de Saint-Sylvestre, c’est à Zurich qu’elle a lieu. Nos suggestions, avant, pendant et après les douze coups fatidiques pour passer le cap de la nouvelle année.
LA JOURNÉE DU 31 DÉCEMBRE
Les soldes
Dès le 27 décembre, c’est la ruée sur les soldes. La Bahnhofstrasse et son kilomètre et demi de boutiques de luxe est un must, avec toutes les grandes marques internationales, sans oublier la boutique Jimmy Choo, ni une pause douceur à la confiserie Läderach pour assister à la préparation de truffes en direct…
Si l’on recherche l’originalité, c’est vers les labels zurichois que l’on se dirigera: Beige, Lyn Lingerie, Stefi Talman, Fabric Frontline, Ida Gut, la liste est longue. En arpentant les ruelles du quartier historique ou la Langstrasse, ou encore le grand centre commercial SihlCity. Autre place à ne pas rater: Im Viadukt, dans le quartier qui bouge, Zurich-West, là même où les frères Freitag se sont implantés. A l’image du Viaduc des Arts à Paris, ce pont a vu chacune de ses 52 arches aménagées en boutiques.
Inauguré il y a quelques mois, il offre un choix éclectique aux amateurs de shopping, de la mode au design en passant par l’épicerie fine. S’il est encore utilisé par les trains, le viaduc permet toutefois aux piétons de se balader sur une passerelle serpentant entre espaces verts et immeubles.
Les adresses des labels zurichois: www.illustre.ch
LA SOIRÉE DE LA SAINT-SYLVESTRE
Plein les yeux
A la tombée de la nuit, place aux illuminations, avec en vedette Lucy. Ainsi baptisé, le nouvel éclairage de la Bahnhofstrasse a coûté la bagatelle de 2,5 millions de francs. Lucy apporte un nuage féerique, poétique, genre Voie lactée sur la célèbre rue. Les petites ampoules led, roses, violettes, blanches scintillent discrètement, un peu perdues parmi les autres lumières des commerces.
Plus convaincant, l’univers coloré recréé dans la cour du Musée national, où les façades du château sont mises en lumière par l’artiste Geri Hofstetter. Des étoiles géantes dansent sur les murs et forment un décor très théâtral pour la petite patinoire éphémère… L’occasion de boire un vin chaud près d’un feu en regardant les patineurs tournoyer dans une ambiance de conte de fées.
LES DOUZE COUPS
A minuit, c’est à la Bürkliplatz qu’il faut être. Avec sa bouteille de champagne prête à être débouchée pendant que les cloches sonnent à la volée. S’il l’on oublie son flacon, des stands proposent des coupes ainsi qu’une multitude de mets du monde. Et à minuit vingt, place au grand feu d’artifice gratuit, tiré à partir de deux bateaux par un artificier suisse. Du délire, de l’émotion et des pétards garantis pendant vingt minutes. Agoraphobe s’abstenir! L’idéal est de se placer dans les environs de la place Bellevue, mais le spectacle est visible depuis tous les quais. Après ce moment fort, la fête se poursuit dans les rues, avec de la musique sur différentes scènes jusqu’à 3 heures.
Au programme: dès 20 h concerts et stands de nourriture sur les quais, à minuit cloches, à minuit vingt feux d’artifice sur le lac, transports publics jusqu’à 4 h.
LE JOUR DE L’AN
Férié, et alors?
Pas question de gueule de bois pour ce premier jour de l’an. Si Zurich joue la belle endormie, ce n’est qu’une impression: nos dix activités pour une entrée dynamique en l’an 2011.
Expo Picasso Un événement exceptionnel au Kunsthaus, 70 tableaux, jusqu’au 30 janvier.
Renseignements et vente de billets: www.kunsthaus.ch
Cirque Conelli De la poésie, des acrobaties, sur une petite île à l’embouchure de la Limmat, jusqu’au 2 janvier.
Réservation: www.circus-conelli.ch
Tour de ville en trolley Tous les lieux intéressants, avec commentaires en français.
The Zurich Trolley Experience. Réservation: www.zuerich.com
Croisière Tour du lac en quatre heures, l’après-midi. Départ de Bürkliplatz.
Rallye Différents parcours en français pour amateurs de découvertes dans la ville.
Zoo Zurich Pour sa forêt tropicale de 11 000 m2.
Accès avec tram 6. www.zoo.ch
Patiner Dans la cour du Musée national suisse, location de patins sur place.
Panorama Une jolie vue sur les toits de la vieille ville depuis le Lindenhof.
Prendre de la hauteur Monter en train à l’Uetliberg avec le S10 et descendre en luge s’il y a assez de neige.
Vitraux contemporains Chagall (au Fraumünster) ou Polke (au Grossmünster): des vitraux superbes.
www.fraumuenster.ch et www.grossmuenster.ch
PRATIQUE
S’INFORMER
ZURICH TOURISME
Pour réserver un hôtel, un bed & breakfast, une visite guidée, un tour en bus, des billets pour une expo ou un spectacle: tous les tuyaux de dernière minute.
Office du tourisme, gare centrale, 044 215 40 00. www.zuerich.com Ouvert tous les jours.
SAINT-SYLVESTRE
Le site dédié à la présentation de la célébration. Avec le plan des quais, l’horaire, des photos, la liste des stands et des bars, les détails pratiques, y compris emplacement des WC!
BONUS WEB: DIX RESTOS OUVERTS 7 JOURS/7
Réservation fortement conseillée
LaSalle Schiffbaustr. 4, le samedi ouvert le soir, www.lasalle-restaurant.ch
Restaurant Terroir, Rämistr. 32, des plats traditionnels réinterprétés, www.terroir.ch
Hiltl, Sihlstr. 28, le fameux resto végétarien branché, www.hiltl.ch
Tibits, Seefeldstr. 2, resto bar végétarien take-away, www.tibits.ch
Molino Pizzeria, Limmatquai 16, cuisine italienne, www.molino.ch
Au Gratin, Bahnhofplatz 2, la spécialité : des gratins de toutes sortes, 044 221 38 00
L’Entrecôte, Bahnhofstr. 6, steak « café de Paris » et frites... 044 211 55 53
Restaurant Zeughauskeller, am Paradeplatz, plats typiques dans un décor d’arsenal, www.zeughauskeller.ch
Adlers Swiss Chuchi, Rosensgasse 10, une dizaine de sortes de fondue au fromage, 044 266 96 66
Brasserie Fédéral, 100 sortes de bière, im Hauptbahnhof, www.brasserie-federal.ch

description.hltext_display: 资金流向日报：超过百亿资金离场
description.author: info@cnfol.com
description.content:
A股市场周三超过百亿资金离场，近九成行业遭到抛售。医药、机械、酿酒等板块抛压沉重，不过钢铁股逆势受捧。
“全景数据决策终端”的监测数据显示，今日深沪两市合计净流出资金113.8亿元，其中机构资金净流出18.93亿元，散户资金净流出94.87亿元。
行业方面，深沪两市81个行业中，共有10个行业录得资金净流入，近九成行业被净卖出。
黑色金属加工板块最受青睐，净流入4.19亿元。航空运输板块流入1.95亿元，黑色采选板块流入0.52亿元，卫生保健护理、水上运输等板块也有少量资金流入。
医药制造板块抛压最重，净流出10.05亿元。电器机械及器材板块流出7.88亿元，饮料制造板块流出6.46亿元，零售、综合类板块分别流出5.51亿元、5.02亿元。煤炭采选、专用设备、土木工程建筑板块流出金额都在4亿元以上。
个股方面，*ST钒钛净流入2.47亿元居首，盐湖钾肥、盘江股份、首开股份、南玻A流入逾亿。
白酒股依旧表现低迷，五粮液、贵州茅台分别净流出1.61亿元、1.57亿元。五矿发展、国阳新能、福星股份、上海医药、柳工等流出超过9000万元。
另外，周三相对资金净流入量前五名的个股为：山东墨龙、泰亚股份、中茵股份、鸿博股份、雅化集团；相对资金净流出量前五名的个股为：通葡股份、宋城股份、中弘地产、皖新传媒、沃森生物。(全景网/陈丹蓉)

description.hltext_display: Количество жалоб омбудсмену в России выросло с прошлого года на 8%
description.content: МОСКВА, 22 дек — РИА Новости. Количество жалоб, поступающих к уполномоченному по правам человека в РФ, в 2010 году увеличилось по сравнению с 2009 годом примерно на 8% и составило порядка 30 тысяч, среди них преобладают жалобы на работу судов, сообщил омбудсмен Владимир Лукин.

description.hltext_display: Ny svensk i amerikanska"Millenium"
description.content:
Den svenska skådespelaren Bengt C W Carlsson är klar för rollen som Holger Palmgren i de amerikanska "Millennium"-filmerna, skriver Moviezine. Skådespelaren har tidigare medverkat i bland annat Roy Anderssons hyllade "Sånger från andra våningen".
Karaktären Holger Palmgren spelades i de svenska filmatiseringarna av Stieg Larssons romaner av Per Oscarsson. Den första filmen "The Girl with the dragon tattoo" regisseras av David Fincher och får biopremiär 21 december 2011.

description.hltext_display: 今日资金流向：银行板块拖累大盘(附股)
description.author: info@cnfol.com
description.content:
1、板块资金流向
今日资金净流入较大的板块：钢铁、期货概念、运输物流、节能环保、电子信息。
今日资金净流出较大的板块：医药、中小板、银行、新能源、有色金属。
2、 大盘后市观点及预期分析
两市今日的总成交金额为2524.24亿元，和前一交易日相比减少181亿元，资金净流出约93亿。昨日中阳反弹后，资金今日无法进一步流入，银行、煤炭、医药、中小板板块的资金反而开始流出，绝大多数板块出现调整，上证指数跌0.9%，收在2877.9.今日指数再回2800-2900区间震荡，而后市上行的关键在于资金的持续净流入，目前仍未看到明确的信号。由于前期有明显资金进场，因此指数下跌的空间也不大。
3、相关热点板块及个股如下：
房地产，净流入较大的个股有：首开股份、阳 光 城、世茂股份、中茵股份、栖霞建设、鑫茂科技。
钢铁，净流入较大的个股有：*ST钒钛 、方大特钢、西宁特钢。
期货概念，净流入较大的个股有：大恒科技、创元科技、中国中期。
电子信息，净流入较大的个股有：大恒科技、北矿磁材、天通股份、有研硅股、福晶科技。

description.hltext_display: 通用電動車Volt搶市 目標3倍跳
description.content:
一部雪佛蘭Volt電動車12月在底特律推出慈善拍賣時，吸引民眾圍觀。
美聯社
消息靈通人士說，通用汽車執行長艾克森準備擴增雪佛蘭電動車Volt的市場，並增加使用類似科技的新車款，希望把電動車的銷售目標提高到目前的三倍以上。
消息人士說，今年9月1日才就任通用執行長的艾克森，12月初曾指示他的領導團隊，必須設法在2010年代中期之前，把電動車的銷售量提高到2012年目標的三到四倍。
通用公司早先曾說，期望2明年年能賣出1萬部Volt，後年再把銷量提高到4.5萬部，通用預期屆時的Volt產能能達到6萬部。
提高Volt的銷量，並開發更多具有電動行駛能力的車款，可以把研發科技的成本分攤開來。不過，密西根伯明罕的顧問公司2953 Analytics的主管哈爾說，這項策略也有風險，因為電動車與油電混合車的銷量一向不高，而且不會帶來獲利。
哈爾說：「這項策略長期來看是對的，但首先必須要降低成本。」「一旦政府的獎勵誘因結束，通用的技術成本就必須夠成熟，能夠壓低售價，確保生產不會帶來虧損。」
通用汽車在走出破產保護16個月後，11月間透過首次公開發行股票(IPO)，籌資逾200億美元。提升電動行駛能力的計畫，凸顯艾克森希望通用走出區隔，成為技術領袖的策略。
現年62歲的艾克森告訴他的領導團隊，他希望通用能開拓新市場，為燃料價格的飛揚未雨綢繆。

description.hltext_display: Deutsche Bank agrees to pay $550 million to resolve federal tax shelter fraud investigation
description.content:
NEW YORK, N.Y. - Deutsche Bank admitted criminal wrongdoing and agreed to pay more than US$550 million in connection with its participation in tax shelters that enabled the rich to temporarily avoid paying hundreds of millions of dollars in U.S. taxes, authorities announced Tuesday.
Federal prosecutors and the Justice Department's tax division announced the deal, saying a nonprosecution agreement requires the bank to continue co-operating and to submit to the appointment of an independent expert who will review its compliance measures and ensure it does not help people dodge taxes in the future.
Authorities said the US$553,633,153 payment by the bank will include that amount of taxes and interest that the Internal Revenue Service was unable to collect from taxpayers from 1996 to 2002 because of the misconduct. It also includes a civil penalty of more than $149 million.
In a statement, Deutsche Bank said it was pleased that the investigation had been resolved.
"Since 2002, the bank has significantly strengthened its policies and procedures as part of an ongoing effort to ensure strict adherence to the law and the highest standards of ethical conduct," it said. The bank said the payment had already been accounted for and would not have any impact on current net income.
Bank spokesman John Gallagher said the company had no additional comment.
U.S. Attorney Preet Bharara said in a news release that the bank provided a detailed statement of facts describing its wrongful conduct.
The nonprosecution agreement bars the bank from involvement with any prepackaged tax products of the type the bank had previously offered, according to the release.
In court papers, the Department of Justice agreed not to criminally prosecute Deutsche Bank for any crimes related to its participation in a broad conspiracy to defraud the Internal Revenue Service.
Authorities said the scheme enabled wealthy U.S. citizens from 1996 through 2005 to evade about $5.9 billion in individual income taxes on capital gains and ordinary income. The court papers said they dodged taxes by claiming $29.3 billion in bogus tax benefits that enabled them to claim losses that did not really exist.
The government said Deutsche Bank participated in about 15 different tax shelters, working 1,300 deals involving more than 2,100 customers.
Some tax shelters were supported by an opinion letter in which accounting giant KPMG and a law firm represented that the customers' tax position would "more likely than not" withstand IRS challenge, the government said.
KPMG LLP reached its own deal with the government admitting its role in the tax-shelter scheme. The firm avoided criminal prosecution by co-operating with authorities and was fined $456 million, including $128 million in forfeited fees from sales of the shelters.

event_or_fact.property: the bank provided a detailed statement of facts describing its wrongful conduct.
the company had no additional comment

description.hltext_display: Tar farväl med "Drottningoffret"
description.content:
Det började med en kronprinsessa och slutar med ett drottningoffer. I jul sänder SVT den sista delen av Hanne Vibeke Holsts trilogi om kvinnor och makt i politiken.
De kallar sig för ett kvinnligt A-team. Regissören, manusförfattarna och huvudrollsinnehavarna i "Drottningoffret" är alla kvinnor - en ovanlighet i en mansdominerad bransch. Men i en tv-serie som skildrar kvinnors förhållande till makt hade något annat varit otänkbart.
Det är sex år sedan tv-tittarna för första gången fick stifta bekantskap med den unga, idealistiska miljöministern Charlotte Ekeblad och hennes kollegor och politiska fiender. "Kronprinsessan" innebar ett genombrott för den danska regissören Kathrine Windfeld, liksom skådespelaren Alexandra Rapaport. I "Drottningoffret", som börjar sändas den 27 december, är det dags att knyta ihop trådarna och ta farväl av Charlotte Ekeblad och de andra karaktärerna.
Ordet "lyxproduktion" nämns ofta under mötet med Alexandra Rapaport, skådespelarkollegan Suzanne Reuter och regissören Kathrine Windfeld. SVT har satsat ordentligt på filmatiseringen av Hanne Vibeke Holsts tre romaner och inte prutat på kvaliteten.
I "Drottningoffret" är det Elizabeth Meyer, socialdemokraternas partiordförande, som står i centrum. Suzanne Reuters rollfigur får mitt under brinnande valrörelse veta att hon lider av Alzheimers sjukdom. Hon bestämmer sig dock för att dölja sin sjukdom och genomföra valrörelsen.
För de allra flesta är Suzanne Reuter mest känd för sina komiska roller. I "Drottningoffret" ger hon visserligen prov på sin komiska tajming, men får också spela ut hela sitt dramatiska register i en ångestladdad skildring av begynnande demens.
Tv-serien innebar också att Suzanne Reuter för första gången fick spela mot sin egen mamma, 84-åriga skådespelerskan Bojan Westin som gör rollen som Elisabeth Meyers moster. En upplevelse, inte minst för tv-tittarna, hävdar Kathrine Windfeld.
Även om det är svårt att skiljas från Hanne Vibeke Holst-trilogin gläder sig teamet åt det beröm som tv-filmatiseringen fått under årens lopp. Lovorden har kommit ända från Rosenbad.
